有没有智慧的问题了，而是你作为人类自身有没有智慧在这个变化的时代快速适应迭代的问题了。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e04b4fc2-29ed-4ce3-bce0-ec89853218e8"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a80c98c0-406e-4008-9d0a-63f0f9c5e1f6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月8日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"aa8e590c-a101-49a4-a57b-fb653aa230bd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"每天都能感受到科技的日新月异，但同时也能感受到这个世界再变的越来越糟。就像《头号玩家》的场景一样，一边是元宇宙，一边是贫民窟。更酷似《黑客帝国》人们已经似乎变成了某种可以被科技公司榨成的电池养料。统一的秩序很美，反差的效果也很惊人，马太效应永远都赢，你要么成为压迫他人的一部分，要么成为被他人压迫的一部分。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"89f2e729-aecb-4d7a-842c-9863ba612936"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"50968043-bdcc-4fe5-a08a-fe26fa78a330"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月9日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4997545a-8628-4701-b1a0-f984fac9ab7e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"小红书能不能打败抖音不好说，但是一定能打败微博，现在微博的信息流内容真就是一言难尽。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5ca971ac-edb1-41ee-95cc-f33caead9800"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a9c4496e-dc4b-48a4-be96-ea87be14763e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月10日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fb112cb7-d5b4-42e7-b13d-674e2c25efee"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对软件极度较真的人应该生产自己的硬件。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5379a106-cf92-462e-b755-d9e7ac1694d6"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6ab92ee0-3cb1-4d5e-88c1-b78d46964351"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"价值观冲突是产生内容的源泉。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b4a6d9fb-d5a1-421a-b084-209eca2ce894"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b5a9c154-61af-42e5-af88-d57fe84510db"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月11日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"78ba48a6-2d20-43e6-9eaa-9b44f0268c64"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们热爱高贵典雅的东西，但没有因此变得柔弱。我们把财富当作可以利用的东西，而不是当作可以夸耀的东西。真正的耻辱不是贫穷这一事实本身，而是不与贫穷作斗争。——伯里克利"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4a2ee666-556d-42ef-b65b-fbe21ccf087b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cbfe08eb-40b8-4583-a9d3-a2f1238afeed"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"秩序与稳定大多是脆弱而不确定的人造物，为的是抑制那些威胁人类事物的无所不在的混沌。在追求化多为一，化多样性为某种潜在的统一性的过程中，我们终将扭曲事物的本来意义。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b9f01121-590c-41af-b509-045d3846abde"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a6ea170f-122a-4402-b688-72bbeee20666"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"永远都是 5% 的人有意愿改变世界，而那 95% 的人就是活着，人本能的会向娱乐类的内容靠近。别批评什么娱乐至死，这才是人类的天性。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3960684b-be76-4e3e-90ab-88211752822b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9caa9f2d-193a-439f-87f4-bcfde07f6343"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"柏拉图说的对，一直蜗居在山洞里的人，他们害怕光明。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0baea652-3610-4440-acc9-2e081edba8b0"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4813c417-9357-4dbe-9b69-e6bd321d29f6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月12日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5359909f-3b85-49fe-b42b-cdfeec204264"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"无论多么先进的模型，预测都是有极限的。就像人生，实力决定你的下限，而命运决定了你的上限。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"845d16a6-0771-4f89-864d-d37ee6630eec"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0028fe7b-480f-4ad1-bd29-e97756d5a9c8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月13日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"983754bf-e3e2-4f20-8539-a7851f9815a3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"系统和产品都应该是简单的，一旦变得复杂就等同于走向灭亡。人喜欢简单但痴迷于复杂。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6b972864-d524-424a-be2e-b6c4a9bb8249"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"53c266fb-5537-4216-aa8b-6a9797e8bf93"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这个世界的很多参差来自于，有些人记性特别好，而有些人却擅长遗忘。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"336f9b03-ba1d-4ffe-92a1-c5ced8005105"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"948b022a-15e4-47d1-bc68-499c39be3d7c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月14日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f58bf308-52cf-44a8-8b5a-e9df0b592aab"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"今早想了想孔子的那句“穷则独善其身，达则兼济天下”越来越不对劲，穷困的时候都能做到独善其身，发达了有那么多既得利益便不能放下就会更能懂得独善其身的道理了。朋友说该改成“穷则软肋少少，达则软肋多多”才更符合时宜。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7e7aca42-ef41-435f-aa1f-accf634208f3"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9c7931aa-ebd8-48d0-a4e3-5c94277a8c97"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月15日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"89a880dd-b23d-436d-933e-fa7f16c30dc6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一个人应该能够换尿布，策划战争，杀猪，开船，设计房子，写十四行诗，结算账户，砌墙，接脱臼的骨头，安慰濒死的人，服从命令，发布命令，携手合作，独立行动，解数学方程，分析新问题，铲粪，电脑编程，做出可口的饭，善打架，勇敢地死去。只有昆虫才专业化。——海因莱因"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"98783f86-5b2c-41c1-aadb-37e5319d4cde"}}]}
cards.title: 思考马克·十三（2023年十一月记录）

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"80d4addb-0985-4b81-82a0-a6ebd99099a4","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"思考马克·十四（2023年十二月记录）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8144a862-1f7c-47ea-9a4d-f7fd62ce7226"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月15日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ef6d6f1b-4614-4fdc-bdb9-cdb0bfc01a30"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们曾问过一个因纳粹屠杀逃出欧洲的富有企业主，为什么他的所有成年子女都是个体经营的专业人士。他回答道：他们可以没收你的企业，但不能没收你的知识！——《邻家的百万富翁》"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"203c2fc4-df27-45bc-b098-a2c350237042"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"16fdbe15-d0fe-4c6e-a197-b5626ef61f5e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月16日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1ddc5f76-2d8d-4072-82ec-9ccf62ef3fd6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Society is better when people have access to knowledge."}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0d1f488c-b5f5-4d4e-b51d-e08e7a892945"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"191c968d-64c2-490e-bd83-6867399d2e45"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月18日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a30c0b25-192c-466f-b81a-ec19bce0cb3f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Every day you can feel the technological change. But you can also feel that the world is getting worse."}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1d41702c-949e-46ff-a0b4-d317f2b384c6"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c314ddc1-45f8-47be-ad42-7a9c97afc0eb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月24日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7aa3a5b7-55ec-4b31-a3bd-ad704ef74d2b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这个世界不怕左派多，更不怕右派抬头。怕的越来越多的左倾右翼，不分是非黑白。在我之上人人平等，在我之下层次分明。没知识，多情绪，站立场。当越来越多人无法独立思考，留下的只能是一地鸡毛。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3474c2dd-2bb6-45a6-9705-1b8775d3d295"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dd8a945f-8f4f-43c0-a931-5221aab7528d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月25日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"20c9419a-c949-4c56-be5e-0d7757bac2e7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"现代人的实用主义大概就是，你不需要弄懂很多原理，会使用前人发明的工具就已经足够了。你不需要懂底层原理或许能更好的利用工具，懂了也不代表你能用它们实现什么更伟大的创造。世界在变得越来越复杂，复杂到人脑已经无法分辨哪些是真相，甚至进化出了大脑的自我欺骗。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5b12291d-d7a6-44ab-9566-53cba6d25b02"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4c15c67f-3f8f-4bca-991f-fb1ab593bbfc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月26日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e25bb575-bef1-4159-aebc-2e524fee734e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"搞内容社区的本质就如同充气娃娃一样，就是给人家泄欲的。没给上面兜好底人家不爽搞你一下，观众老爷们没看爽也会冲你发泄一下。需要你的时候，大家都想抚摸你甚至觉得你不可或缺。不需要你的时候，就会觉得你真恶心会像垃圾一样无情丢弃。永远都不要成为别人的泄欲工具，虽然被需要，但是没前途。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0a6d4abb-fad9-48cd-8017-f73a80be997e"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"50939651-50d9-4a48-babb-c016ca040442"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月28日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d086c28c-9123-4214-bcd7-a89e158ad071"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"As Stephen Kosslyn notably says, The first maxim is “Think it through.” The key idea is very simple: the more you think something through, paying attention to what you are doing, the more likely you are to remember it."}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f1f8e35a-44be-46e2-ad81-5cdfbf77d255"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"When we read, another person thinks for us: we merely repeat his mental process. … For the more one reads the fewer are the traces left of what one has read; the mind is like a tablet that has been written over and over. Hence it is impossible to reflect; and it is only by reflection that one can assimilate what one has read if one reads straight ahead without pondering over it later, what has been read does not take root, but is for the most part lost. Indeed, it is the same with mental as with bodily food: scarcely the fifth part of what a man takes is assimilated; the remainder passes off in evaporation, respiration, and the like.—— Schopenhauer"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e25c33fa-f95a-4107-b375-21402f1582b3"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f4960be1-6b2f-4cac-b574-96db732e8a99"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们总应该在这无尽无意义的旅途中找点存在下去的理由：丰富这个旅程，大胆的去尝试。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"aba02e78-e78b-4c18-ac93-f1ea9f1f83ba"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"31afe130-c4bd-459a-8896-3e3836042e3d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月30日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d1398bda-621c-43d8-a4cc-d5c6c56354d5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"永远都是少数精英在掌握着话语权，边缘化的群体好似都不存在过。人类一直在为少数东西在进行着溢价支付，所以进入名校圈子，进入这个话语体系就变得非常重要。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"55305595-3e4a-4480-83e6-cd9bce1936b2"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"38514598-8588-4ede-a52c-89bf56602c93"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月1日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cd3ecd4a-1568-4a64-b278-6a6a633ba8c3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如果所有的教育是把一个正常人规训成一个“合格的奴才”，那这样的教育不接受也罢。从古至今，从不缺少奴才不是嘛。小到一个家庭、一家公司、大到一个社会，其实我们和大清并不遥远，百年轮回，我们有了更好的物质生活，然后呢？剩下只有感恩，谢主隆恩。就像鲁迅先生说的，我们极容易变成奴隶，而且变了之后会万分喜欢。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"44814c05-9783-49b4-8215-bef541c916f0"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8455ccda-e230-49e4-8948-1f16abc0df43"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月3日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0f921d05-5c76-40a5-a5e3-1c4d6252add3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们应当如何生活，我们又应当如何死去，这两者同等重要。你活过，你死了，却和大多数人的活法和死法都不一样。我们似乎都走过一样艰难曲折的人生道路，如今我们仍然活在你思想的遗产里，很多人也都过上了你理想中的生活。但我们都不敢忘记，你曾经来过﹝1﹞。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8dc4a908-bcfc-44ec-916a-63496b5a20c8"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fbad010f-9640-4245-b784-234ba58511aa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月6日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2429abc8-a5c4-4798-b926-b3823677ef45"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Prompt 最好的中文翻译不是提示词，而是咒语。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d9d83567-dded-4e57-980d-7149699db37f"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c4817b04-a282-4de4-8549-cc624cf12047"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月7日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0debf3ef-f3bd-485c-acd5-5376bb134fcd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"教育的古怪之处在于，如果把学生当做天才去教育，学生几乎注定不会成为天才，因为天才是靠自学的；但是，如果把学生当做弱智去教育，那学生肯定会变成弱智──因为人傻是被教出来的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"74c5dd27-6d22-4404-8ab6-8095d8bdd22f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"——李笑来"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1ab6b87a-668d-44b1-afb5-6b6724acc30b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"42854629-0c71-43eb-9a04-1609fa0801a0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月10日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2c66bd8d-6756-4398-ac7f-8d50a862e316"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所有的内容社区最后都会沦为情绪的放大器。秀无知，秀下限。不要问为什么，因为真正“有趣的人”已经默不作声了。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"200c4b8e-d4dc-4ce2-85cb-9d597a14868b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2e23e822-d68b-470e-a652-5ea54e637380"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月11日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5c4894d4-f758-4039-9bed-6f67b77b8108"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"生物之间的根本区别是获取以及处理信息方式，所以读书等能让人涨见识的可以让人明智。但这有个大前提是你得获取到优质的信息，悲哀之处在于很多人并不希望人们轻易平等的获取到优质信息。他们一直在尝试用垃圾信息灌满人们的脑子，我们并非天生愚蠢和偏见，更多是乱花渐欲迷人眼，让人们迷失了生的方向。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"204ab2a4-89bd-48ae-9df0-d2e52aa41d23"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9234fe07-f972-46b5-b949-8147d54d011f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月16日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b085c812-0488-47a7-b70c-ac5224f74c38"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"曾经那些镶着金边的，有关汗水的承诺，而今都已然变成了一种对个体毫无意义的剥削，一种企业为了降本增效所炮制出来的精致谎言。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0471f2d9-3cc5-4d27-b9c5-e3bffd2af655"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"43eaf348-7d8e-4710-99de-da44fedb632f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月17日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9c1abb9c-a6ef-4af4-9524-78542570858b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Things should be made as simple as possible, but not any simpler."}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7ed9a9d7-6a1f-45d1-9606-527955ae2bd5"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cffb19ce-dca9-44a3-8ed7-0c08fcb5f535"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月18日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"17c95882-8ed3-4a2f-b20c-c7f73e1502f0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"他们从来只会逼好人，而对那些杀他父母的人却从来都是怯懦的。他们从来都是自以为是的勇敢，因为他们根本不想付出任何代价。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"58f0c6fc-16fe-4bbc-8276-f9f5d04f1810"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8314ce88-f9f3-4088-91a8-07bddce5946c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"好人要经历九九八十一难才能成佛，而坏人只需要放下屠刀。君子只要一件事没有做好就会背上一世骂名，而小人常戚戚改过了就可以自新。管理预期真的很重要，预期是美好的最大杀手。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b75b4cb0-44ba-4dcb-8d2e-029c3a5c443f"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"696dadd2-32d1-4051-a7c0-6f00a96a0ac5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月20日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ae7ef279-5aa6-4108-9982-d10ee1c52c8c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"地球是一个摇篮，但是我们不能永远呆在摇篮里。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b6f3d2da-9d3e-4376-9de4-5991d2c834c8"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1c57c564-7db9-4941-a1bf-1a576982c6f9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月21日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"304bcf74-5c54-4b8f-a3af-1f7a74c72d36"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以前觉得互联网时代最不容易给人洗脑，后来发现没有哪个时代比这个时代更容易给人们灌输某种情绪和概念。甚至很多时候现象级的火爆内容都带有一种抽象，似乎没人能解释明白。相反越是这样，大家越愿意讨好某种流行的话语。以前的集体性是被迫的，现在的集体性是自发的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"30c0abcc-2b1c-4f57-a3be-cde126d13a1f"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9c2c85e7-e33e-42ea-84c5-ddbda5ae7625"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月24日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6fe5ab9d-384b-41b9-ac91-45db8483dfe9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们要做的不是惧怕风险，对于大多数普通人来说跨越阶层的唯一办法就是要去勇敢“冒险”。重要的根本不在于如何避免问题，而是去找到问题，并尝试用新方法去解决问题。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6c40417e-ee7a-497b-ad5a-2fcd8a2fb21b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"44c67b83-37a7-4d17-aba3-3cfa828f4e32"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"现在看来马斯克判断对了，OpenAI 确实是一点都不 Open ，人工智能的未来不应该被某一家公司或者某个人控制，这对人类文明来说将是巨大的威胁。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d212e564-df35-4389-acb7-3d9660327669"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"825d44fb-235f-4531-837d-38e27feef34e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月26日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ba0676c3-737e-463e-99bd-d10f621b3ff9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"天赋是一种下意识，是与生俱来的算法。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"80b8c939-5e1b-4e5b-98be-b3acda4cb65b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4a32a7c7-30e3-4f62-a52c-b1dfc616ec60"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月27日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"495bdc33-d704-480e-99a3-824b6a7a2412"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们总是喜欢用旧经验去解释新现象，这或许是想象力受限的原因。如果我们想要创造一个新世界，那我们真正需要遵守的就是最基本的原理。受限于物理定律的规则，才是我们真正需要遵守的规则。我们需要的是一个新秩序，所以其他的只能是建议。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e06146fb-881d-413f-a7bd-6956aff9cc80"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ea3bf3b4-631c-4364-8aab-82bb25b9a236"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月28日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6ccc7e51-1437-4f72-a972-b1e76fb74df6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Back to the beginning, interpret the future."}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ffb22421-2b10-4850-9e4e-46c98dc8ef49"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"68238525-6568-4b0b-8855-4f36dbdb6b49"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"“神”是不是一位程序员，创世纪的前几天一直在创造变量和参数（日月山川），直到他开发完了这个系统（宇宙）。最后他创造了这个可以给万物命名的生物——人类，命名一直是人的特权，但却没有明确声明。关于上帝是什么，或许就一直藏在人类的语言之中，我们同样也在模仿上帝用语言在创造更多的“小宇宙”。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8cf724ea-3b71-460e-8f46-342d3a6b864b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"63bb6ab7-20a8-41ec-9961-3818fd24b495"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月29日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"38b7bbb3-b2aa-4329-be0f-ac3757cea5de"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我遇到的所有最酷的人，都是通过我写的东西我做的产品找到我的人。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"39abdd5f-4b1e-4d65-a3b2-81c8f26add45"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d2d83cbd-00f6-4d81-8ca7-fc9018bec4e8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月30日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"93df178e-2f2c-4144-86aa-2f9de9397ea0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"敢于冒险，哪怕是付出生命的代价。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e94b4653-4ff2-4b59-8a2e-f508ed3c6ced"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"da379d38-683f-4194-9444-a74c205d3d4c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月31日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bf7f06eb-cbca-4abc-a935-64e0d10d9257"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有时候，正是那些人们认为的无用之人，成就了无人所成之事。"}]}]}
cards.title: 思考马克·十四（2023年十二月记录）

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3ad82e28-1d5f-4b44-a0cd-d6dbe0b1f956","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"思考马克·十五（2024年一月记录）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2c0aeede-7746-4513-8b80-b30d544a94b7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1月3日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"58d325bc-f87a-456b-b14a-79ae032558cd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"越旧的记忆越模糊，但越远的历史反而越清晰。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f0f0cd00-277c-40bd-8f2e-fcb60709daa4"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a2bedcc8-5481-4897-8fec-e8e9e22dbd2a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1月4日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a76654a6-5b74-4c90-92db-1091e2335346"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"死者为自己作证的方式却只剩下坟墓。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"70714544-6cc5-42f7-ba6b-27f79c1bef03"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3ba5cb33-2e1a-4e88-bd12-2c50c18baf55"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1月5日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f8056387-993c-4ca7-ba54-ac59a80828a4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"英文翻译过来的书都会有很多其他人写的导读，这真的很让人厌烦，这种引言放在书籍后序还好，但一般会放在正文前。如果读者真的喜欢一本书，还需要读这个导读嘛，但大概率会因为导读失去阅读兴趣。当然有写的好的导读，但真的寥寥无几，大多数导读都又臭又长。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4f963347-a177-45a3-aa97-ce28afb3906d"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a7547ab4-9da0-44e1-abac-1ca598072924"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1月7日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a5c69f6f-ae79-4750-8ab1-b5bc8435d38d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"语言的匮乏会让我们变笨，语言的边界就是思维的边界，也是世界的边界。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0d50eed0-edbe-4e5d-9db2-fdd7013bb985"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dca5d45e-bb31-443e-9b84-d8a573619e8c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人类用函数描述世界。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0e423d1a-d162-46a6-9af0-fcd656ccaca8"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c44081d9-8513-438b-8904-38c1861b2acd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1月8日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"758aef42-1591-4a6c-9ab3-d95e05a01e22"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"世人误以为科技会自动进步，但事实上，只有当很多人致力于科技的改善，科技才会进步。同理，只有当很多人在推动社会发展，社会才可能前进。否则进步就会停顿，甚至是倒退。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7596d51d-65d5-47c0-ad8a-d062e9bb7cbd"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2340b118-f27b-423a-aa34-da1a15803c0a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1月11日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0b2cf32a-2ba3-4f12-a880-fd2b6f15d2af"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"喜欢读王小波的人，一定是一个有趣的人。如果他的很多黑色幽默甚至是地狱笑话也能让你会心一笑，那我们一定能成为好朋友。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cca75a3c-eae8-45a9-87e0-c983aa2f6ae3"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"673d20dd-1f8b-4eb3-9fab-0d40dbe0a3f5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1月12日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cc350895-6cfa-46f6-94ac-1214bb860f6c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一个人的无趣是从对他人进行价值判断开始的，我们很容易轻易地对他人进行道德上的谴责。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b437d600-b5a2-4153-ab42-6c7c8f3d2cc7"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"08d18ab5-4e69-42a3-ac23-698624b9d926"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1月13日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cb273068-f2de-44cf-b0ba-e105a40d2400"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"易中天说评判历史不应该非黑即白，去做条件局势的分析，比做道德批判深刻的多、高明的多、重要的多。王小波也在《沉默的大多数》中写道的，此人之肉，彼人之毒。一件对此人有利的事，难免会伤害另一个人。真正的君子知道，自己的见解受所处环境左右，未必是公平的，所以他觉得明辨是非是难的。但人们始终理解不了复杂，理解不了善恶本同源，因为没有比做价值判断更简单的事儿了。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"26690252-0567-4dc8-890f-b7c54308f966"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a53a4fe9-38f5-46da-a038-75ea4ef8b975"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1月14日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"23af75b5-0b0a-4e24-ac23-e3ae4180dcc2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"善良永远比聪明更重要，因为善良是习得的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"138b9456-7ec3-4abc-8db6-1a7e239d7c1b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"aa2b2031-1fe4-4170-a77c-333af975a16f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所有感性的背后都有一个深层次的理性逻辑。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"610d450c-a869-42be-8de4-37679ab95348"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"aebfe099-c807-41e7-9004-c4e11a4e2a64"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"社科就是在用语言解释这个世界的函数变量。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"219af237-2b16-4272-ba7b-889a8497cb70"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"011bd812-5854-43bc-b581-56904afc4cc4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1月15日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e272c88b-ba8d-433f-a576-57de97da84b3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"小人物的命运、奋斗、挣扎、失败，那些长期被排除在精英叙事之外的故事，因为科技的进步自媒体的普及，而变得越来越可见。即便是不识字的人，现在也可以留下属于自己的个体痕迹，即便是对生活琐事的零碎记录，无需触及宏大的问题，也能找到个体存在的价值和意义。存在主义是一种人道主义，这个世界或许不是所有可能存在的世界中最好的一个，但你我都有责任。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"387ccba2-ed95-4b37-bade-ab0a6c54e35b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4833107a-e011-4d79-a454-14e0a08ffd1f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"牺牲也是要在历史的关键时刻牺牲，平时的牺牲是没有价值的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bfd151c9-08b8-4daa-aa0b-e3713210109b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e92c806d-739c-4f84-a5a7-8639825955eb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"首先要做的永远都不是用户规模，而是吸引有趣的人。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"627612fe-56a9-41e1-a4ec-5300fde3ceb5"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2e84f1eb-225c-4499-9afb-28830cc29064"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1月16日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"600474ec-f67f-4ec4-a884-1fe364658856"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一个社会被一群无趣的人裹挟着太可怕了，懦弱胆小、开不起玩笑、经不住诱惑、思想封闭、不包容异见……自由永远是一项重罪，有人选择了它，却被判刑；有人逃避了，却成就了他人的自由。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7c8d3254-8779-44e4-9b6e-11f581c1678c"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0d4c66d9-d082-4bf3-b694-6d1a93401df2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1月17日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a8abb39f-76bf-49f8-9215-c48f8894fd2c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人的价值，总是在面对诱惑的那一瞬间被决定。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d22b683e-0c97-4fa8-8d0b-cbc5982591d9"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bf62f0a5-433d-49c3-a929-e61742e1dbcf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"企图让别人闭嘴的人不配有说话的自由，不让他人自由说话的人不配有说话的自由，自由的前提是平等。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c5760f63-5206-4a2c-81ed-a1eb638fb307"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b33badef-0508-4834-840f-266fb2b23285"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1月19日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b69e6a64-4471-4cb6-85ab-00b5580ff291"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"层楼终将误少年，盗贼王臣谎言。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"99d45c72-36f3-43cb-84cf-a7e868c6e11b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"aac03a71-012e-47f3-b4f2-08e899e8c52b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"严谨的思考需要精准的用词。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4a048da4-25e4-4c20-bbc0-87c47adfc581"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"89e5b0d2-49cb-4592-8ba6-4f24b6396192"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"努力并不能够改变你的命运，它只是命运的一部分。找到属于自己的命运之路，才是真正的人生攻略。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"152ec7cf-24e0-4b14-b073-888339aa6577"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ab7a62f5-f44f-48a7-afbe-c8894802618d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1月20日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ee8892da-ff4e-48d3-994f-49e3c762ef73"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"正负能量是最令我讨厌的一句价值判断。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a1221769-3151-45f2-a7df-4b05d8d681df"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cfdb4a8d-fc47-4dcd-9e5e-a87209feff6f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"讨论一个概念的前提是双方得对这个概念理解一致。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c0121a70-2891-4930-aac6-9507edaef36a"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d74999d1-ab28-44db-b9c3-a360c7dd50a8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1月21日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"728a2629-95af-41d3-8106-9ef606400051"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"信仰之所以叫信仰就是不能被证伪。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a5628ef7-8269-4a40-9023-1e37ff6cf11b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"73746cb5-ca13-42c2-baec-4214bd2054bb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人不能太现实，否则就会太短视。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"667c1280-9d8b-4e67-b0d5-6fea2f0a2deb"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ae01e7fa-d7df-475f-aa6a-c38a0ca5c9bd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1月22日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b29d3f2e-313e-4fc1-9c81-2173520fcc5c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"引发深思的文字很高级，让人觉得有趣的文章同样高级。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"687f803a-b9f2-4ed6-b835-4dd0830f959e"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f5e55483-680a-4b68-8dad-cd122bc2e153"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1月23日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e8d711b6-1347-4866-b3fc-5bf80471a490"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"那些看似有趣的其实都非常无趣，那些看似无聊的人其实都有些闷骚。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"10d10e96-2e47-429c-9d64-12333533e77f"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"562cc4af-b51f-4111-a087-81f7f3796412"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1月24日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9efaaafd-9bf5-4e74-8a6f-e7cc9db32ba5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"只有透过无止境的输入，累积形成多元而充满自我风格的知性世界，才有办法达到源源不绝的输出。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"12b05b71-0176-4d9f-961d-45e12b22f83e"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"52f60a75-0f42-4934-9055-0c51c31efb87"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1月25日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"efdd5f05-aa56-409d-ab18-38185d0fd678"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如果不能勇敢，那么鲁莽好于谨慎。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"58472420-4116-41eb-8c50-e101d3f0fd5f"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"153def1e-4daa-4e07-bdb4-820cb0605429"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1月27日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"327aac87-272d-48a4-bcb4-a60053e73deb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在千百年来，千百万人筛选出来、总结出来的自洽的逻辑面前，我们还需要保持谦卑。这些生存和思考的方式都不可能简单地在一个时代就可以迅速转变。信息塑造人，生存筛选人。每个人都是幸存者，每一个人也是刚愎自用者。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e9484728-c640-4e14-9480-f8365cd39dd1"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ee693409-6e68-4440-ac78-d8088635e91a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1月29日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ebe169dc-2448-4437-8ea4-71b33471ec0e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为何真实世界会被幻象包围与侵蚀？布尔斯廷给出的诊断是：我们有过度的期望。我们总是期望看到更多的、好玩的新闻，那么制造伪事件的人就抓住了我们的这种期望，蓄意制造、炒作出一些好玩的事件，满足我们的胃口。布尔斯廷的这种论述当然有道理。正如卡夫卡所言，人类最大的缺陷就是懒惰和没有耐心。我们总是期待更多的轻松享受，不愿去做辛苦和困难的事情，这就使得我们心甘情愿走进了他人精心设计的幻象当中。说来说去，那些所谓的优秀内容创作者，也不过是能够调动起观众情绪的一群人。至于事情的真实性与否他们似乎并不在意，当然观众也不在意。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"44e3efd3-0f79-4b2d-99b5-ba435f76ba5a"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"49650206-752e-4d5f-a3d5-f3978d17bc0b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"希望是多么宝贵的东西啊，怎么就能轻易的把它交给别人呢？不期望、不依附、不相信，就没什么能伤害到你。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1e2204dd-4442-492d-937f-4fc3a5430971"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"03ec4ef7-ad44-4fb9-a4d0-608dd2690896"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"小而美才自由。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f3dc66a4-29b5-4c41-b8ce-300c5542522c"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1be465d2-ddec-47c9-b94c-d5aae29bb9a0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2月1日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ddddfd57-3df4-451b-923b-7a8750253fe8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"读书修性世事洞明皆学问"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"59ff6ec6-1fdf-406a-94a6-b62e2d4e6151"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"省察役物人情练达即文章"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"03e95817-c73f-4cc3-bba5-b605e5ed5f7a"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cc6923fe-52fc-4639-939d-cbe1d3ff1d06"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2月2日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4206b894-79ae-49d7-af6c-f6bb4b65a1f8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"善良永远是一种宝贵的社会资源，因为恶意会传染。善良永远是一种个人选择，它从来都不是没有代价的，更不应该被道德观念绑架。认清生活的真相还仍然选择善良的人永远是值得人尊敬的，但我更希望善良的人要学会保护好自己，善良更需要武装到牙齿。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a8154631-720d-41ed-8bc9-3dbc1cdbe9e9"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8e669117-60f1-4da6-ad02-3e033c40d2c2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2月4日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"914a60d3-25b1-489a-bb8e-5fb079ceef2e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"宣传的本质就是简单和重复。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"03c6fc0c-7243-4c89-8d05-258130092e9e"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"07a8bf89-2b52-40ea-8f5b-6a4d205510e2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2月6日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"44395b2d-f1e8-44cb-9ba5-1c4024daf119"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"枪声一响，你就会被迫成熟了。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"be85f5f7-ca46-4e2a-ab12-48c9e9f6a7ea"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"263ecdc6-b5a8-4dac-acbe-a7a6afcfe973"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2月7日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9e3f1b6a-c991-4c36-b581-5498369d3a84"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"社交媒体信息流现在都在讨论Vision Pro，上次这样情形应该是一年前的ChatGPT。人类社会太需要新鲜感了，大家都在说什么未来已来，但别忘了人总是在最接近幸福的时候最幸福，因为在几年前我们也是这么期待的。一年又一年过去了，或许在未来的某一年回过头来看，2023年也算是个好年份。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"57e0a882-f9ad-4fa1-89ac-65e2b7cd191e"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6365b29b-e862-4ed7-b465-8a51b24e077e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2月8日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"099cb0fb-ef83-424f-8b94-2f5bb39b1371"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"快乐是两次痛苦中间的休息。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"23585843-3c63-4f9a-8af1-c877c04c0bca"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b7ad5251-d513-42b9-a2eb-40efc4cc212e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"把个人从群体中解放出来是进步的体现。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ea76a261-c306-40e3-b112-7b731c2feb7c"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f411cf03-2f79-43aa-abef-8521fb31b7f6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"多体验生活，才知道有哪些垂类需求未被满足。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"da8e644f-e030-47a6-bf77-6faeeae08e51"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b72f5eb6-f1e8-4ad2-a3a2-334661b405ef"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2月9日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"13493e52-8094-4717-b96f-a38c96325dcb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"想了好久祝大家什么，升官发财的祝愿今夜一定是“超发”了，那我就祝大家新的一年都有保留更多的耐心吧。在当下注意力是宝贵的事物，用心才能发现生活中的有趣，保留最大的善意用常识去恢复作为一个人的轮廓更是可贵。人可以不必追求深刻，但愿我们快乐。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"14b424ae-3a3e-46c8-8b6b-c21fdcd54909"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c88be3d2-1b4e-422c-ac34-d082ab0717e6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2月10日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5d91bc2f-f90d-45a6-b980-2a376c58b742"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"祝大家新的一年把没读的书读完，把想读的书读尽。在阅读里，忘记烦恼；在智识上，收获自由。"}]}]}
cards.title: 思考马克·十五（2024年一月记录）

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"8aba84bc-e531-4ba3-aac6-3f1352e11f00","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"思考马克·十六（2024年二月记录）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ee8cf3fc-c547-4cf8-a5ee-0f8dd78dd254"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2月11日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d9f87257-bdc5-4bd8-bd78-570f8cb7a825"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在一个信奉社会达尔文主义的社会里，你的容忍会被人视为软弱，你的让步会让你堕入万丈深渊。所以我看到很多人变得冷漠，变得不择手段，我能理解每个人的自私，因为人之间的利益本就不一致。可惜，这是我花了好久才懂得的道理。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f7ceb8ce-55aa-41a0-889b-8f39729a427b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5ade66c2-97a3-406b-b886-f35d81cd324c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2月16日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b02aa088-e050-4e9b-b7ac-b14944835195"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"理想主义的人都应该读读马基雅维利。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"aa81a3af-87a8-414e-b611-0f684bb93e63"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e7d91923-61c7-45c4-ba06-70589357f982"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2月18日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3289f885-aaf5-4082-a6f7-b077c973ab35"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"已知的东西不等于学问，除非把它记录下来。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"704de587-7220-4a6e-9331-2059a44dafe0"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e7452394-0b06-443b-8236-1db1b5e9da88"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2月20日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3a10e934-beef-4136-9f1f-11e6cb5c85eb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"看来我必须学会弄脏自己的双手，纯洁是僧侣的理想，为了胜利我们应该学会必须去做必须要做的事情。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"232e4b86-0630-439c-8ede-1c264f24a744"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3b8d65d9-23f2-4d79-8822-1c9c10ed84ca"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2月21日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"02ed3e96-57cf-45cb-be89-3f9d947fe718"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"理想是一个旗帜，它是给外人看的，不应该天天在家里插着观赏。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c6c5350d-4334-4ac6-8d6c-7fadd86c1e37"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f6d93b08-ff91-410e-a566-440937b800ec"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2月22日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"27a4c14f-7405-4298-a9ce-43c50c0893ec"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一个人的强大是内心的强大。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e1e6a760-8467-4c84-89e4-7bc8c9218f1b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"945fac1a-d150-4cd2-8ccd-2345a8ea8201"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2月23日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3e5dccb4-9962-42c6-b8ad-2cf2a5d95138"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"就像尼采说的，形而上学会让人变得虚无。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"99167984-855c-44e8-ade2-4ed7f6bc3ed9"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f52306b5-83cd-4de1-b015-2075e5ab8213"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2月25日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"071ed1a8-205a-486b-a671-1a71e35b9e35"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"创业的核心不是创新而是成本。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b175a31f-10d4-4352-87b4-041f62ec8b7b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ad158e88-68e5-4bff-b8a7-fe9be6ab66d6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2月26日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a730ecaa-e21f-4ef3-8423-5b181585d81d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"没有结果的努力都是不努力。挺悲哀的，让我想起了未发迹之前的苏秦，几千年来这个思想都未曾改变。人这一生，真正关心你的人非常少。很多人只看结果不问原因，所以不要指望别人会多么认真地关心你，即使是非常欣赏你的人。所以要学会理解别人，要学会不抱怨。人性的弱点就是只看结果，不问原因。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2d1ef44c-6077-4ff8-830d-ea01873ae957"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5baf96d5-cfd0-4397-9718-806a3903776a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2月27日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c9fa22ea-fb08-4904-ad9d-79170553bb81"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"三荆欢同株，四鸟悲异林。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"11b0100e-c47d-4662-a28e-5a88f8421abf"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e1481b55-3a6a-4788-a031-72d9c0703667"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2月28日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a2951aad-b695-42cb-87b5-b24378f4e2b5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"中国历史上历来不缺少枯木逢春，老来发迹的例子。大器晚成的人，他没有年少轻狂，没有少不更事。年轮的重叠，使他们更加珍视机遇，岁月的磨砺，让他们世事洞明，人情练达。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8a4680ef-8d2c-499d-a90b-639e918bb19f"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"57a4c68e-d804-4f89-b641-f64fcc25b463"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人一旦飞黄腾达，是睚眦必报还是既往不咎，考验的是一个人的气量。但是在冥冥之中，似乎也牵引着个体命运的轨迹，人还是应当做的大度一点为好。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"53e04bd0-bf07-4b88-bc5f-d6bfc89a5ac3"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7a433422-ad71-459b-968b-c2c8d56dee1b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人生是一个漫长和艰辛的接力赛，有时领先有时落后，但是你只要在路上，你就有机会。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"203d8065-fc75-45ca-9ac7-d3cc9cf29281"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"61c7ef41-8771-48e3-b8f3-3222fecffc44"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"及时行乐就像一只兴奋剂，它能够点燃你幸福的华彩，但也能加速你生命的衰败，所以人还是应当有一些节制。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9505d9ef-6123-40f3-ad30-dfa57e7cb948"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"718d30ca-dd10-4f6d-997f-dd3b57aa8925"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2月29日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"53f430a2-1dbb-4b4c-9a49-2df5e6b299f6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人是用脚投票的，而不是用嘴投票的。所以孔子说要“听其言观其行”，这个世界该怎么样和这个世界是什么样之间、人们崇高的意图和现实的后果之间，本就存在着巨大的鸿沟。不要看人们说了什么，而要看他们最后做了什么。"}]}]}
cards.title: 思考马克·十六（2024年二月记录）

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"b055b9d6-c6ff-4ee8-8e7a-baef05681a27","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"思考马克·十七（2024年三月记录）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3efc853e-26cf-495c-a8b1-0e457aafda0a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3月1日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6d69d2e2-9c86-4fbe-a224-53574e5cfd75"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"经典常常不是你读懂的，而是你的人生经历和经典相碰撞、共鸣以后，你感悟出来的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b62d831f-8c61-46cb-9489-d54238d89404"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"666b51bb-44ba-4313-8401-950ceadef055"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3月2日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"edcb8be7-2283-4e22-9954-f5afa6be6e9d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人们都说喜欢高雅，但转身又沉迷于恶趣。我们始终没学会和自己的欲望和解，我们始终没学会正视心中的执着。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6bec9161-1b84-461a-b3c8-cbf09263ae4a"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"396f0bce-1d6d-4bb5-8c60-bb8739b5a65d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3月3日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b3aff459-c045-42f7-88f9-898d03c3a547"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最近深有感触，年轻人对完美乌托邦的迷恋，总是会让最好成为了更好的敌人。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fb07e8aa-5c0f-4a32-aa50-87a5984dfa9d"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"312ac62d-ae05-430e-8d6b-18f46f843ca6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3月4日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"30ee0774-6868-4e9c-b8bc-ead3eefd1f72"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"欲望>体验，相通的不是道理而是人性。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"25789221-59b4-402e-9e45-a18453b1f595"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9dc6ad62-1dc3-4ce5-817d-4ad054fad743"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3月5日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"73996322-1fce-490d-a965-8accc4c3b963"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"现代化的过程不就是一个逐渐祛魅，从相信土法偏方到依靠科学发现的过程吗？一个人思想成熟的标志之一，就是能写出清晰连贯、逻辑通畅、言之有物的文章。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c54b8a23-83c2-4a24-8173-a1b9f8de664e"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f50b49d0-9122-44ef-b20e-397caa39fe3e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3月7日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b54d0de5-aad8-4ed8-ab90-c7169a541715"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如果你想舆论变成你想要的样子，那么你一定不要说出他们想说出的话，一定要说出他们的对立面。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0150086f-f928-4c32-8c39-62845ba12bb5"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ef5f98fe-8085-4dcb-933f-870846c8ac3d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3月9日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5065e45e-0019-464f-b5e4-a6ea54fba8d9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们真的不关心世界的其他地方。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6f5564db-5e47-4e93-9aad-25aff1f6edc1"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"152023d2-aa8b-4a31-b163-22bd5ff34b6b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3月10日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a268caca-f5bd-4b53-a2c7-7c950bd76e1d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"意志抵挡不了规律。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"769606e4-2d5d-4cb2-852c-1bbe9ccabd38"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"92f145d1-7c55-4595-adf6-2591902d52fd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3月12日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e107adec-3ccf-4c41-91d8-3954a2289734"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"知道存在荒谬，却不靠近虚无。真正的成熟不是变得复杂，而是抵达天真。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"177b842c-41fd-4a6f-ac5e-e68f42a76bbe"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b4d68327-fa01-49be-8c16-3ca699aa9ae2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3月15日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dac00cb7-8d51-4bdd-8f82-6e8bed1886f2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"应该尽量多的把经验或感想都落实到文字上存档起来。人生短暂，总不应该花太多的时间在重复的事情上，这样也能方便后来人查阅。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"09a35b51-874c-47fe-8760-155ab57ef8d5"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1e952b37-63d0-435b-8d9d-77d851e1452c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"独立思考的前提是要有足够多的输入，当你所有的喜好都来自于身边流行的时候，你自然不会有任何独立思考的可能。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5ce4ece9-ceb5-4978-9cc3-cc75b4d5734f"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c89c34d6-8253-4cb4-a422-d5fbc5809941"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3月16日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8ed9f8d8-603a-4221-91aa-4170cf3bf9ae"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"宏大叙事果真是底层人的春药啊，移民火星就是马斯克给全世界人民打的一剂猛药。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"21d38f0a-2c0f-4f72-b007-a9e3bdc8e407"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c50b3a73-ba66-4f0f-be16-14a754766862"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"看不到过去的人，也同样看不见未来。谁掌握了过去，谁就掌握了未来。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"726ad5eb-462b-4596-9971-c3d1c81ecbf0"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1b0caba1-a3b8-4a93-a1d1-9723d5557943"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3月18日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5a2c5bc8-ac1a-4ab8-97f1-9c6594fd3891"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"你永远可以相信汉斯·季默。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1bece753-285f-4ecf-b033-1a06256635d7"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9c2c389f-6eb1-43c2-b07f-dd16dec27a83"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3月20日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5373664a-b9b3-4c1b-ab49-78e5e32fe306"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"1587年朱翊钧二十四岁了，这是他登上皇位的第十五个年头。前十五年对他来说已是非常漫长，但他不知道的是他是本朝在位最久的皇帝，后来他还要再忍受三十三年。作为历史的读者站在上帝视角，后来的事儿我们当然也都知道了。大明两京一十三省的文官集团、抗倭将领抑或其皇帝自身，或身败或名裂，或身败名裂。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6bb69302-98ea-4c40-a974-cc7ae2df0f78"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8d7e835d-1776-45a8-b401-dd2eed89b618"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3月21日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6a98556d-4199-473d-b2f8-456354b8c60f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人的幸福感来自于智慧，大概是聪明且不内耗。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ad867f79-0d16-4aab-9935-5d55fd5e4808"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2d5ea197-e2df-400c-9fa1-51827b58d2b9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3月22日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"efef818c-d119-4884-8b88-4f8bd532168c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人只有一种病，就是熵增，而熵增是无法被治愈的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c0f03db4-5caf-4c8a-84b3-faacd7e0c4bf"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"709ef577-7ce5-46a9-ab00-e318f351941b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3月23日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d49fa6ec-be69-497f-a262-c86e82455f21"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一支笔的威力，胜过三千毛瑟枪。人类并不完美，却是有史以来最凶猛的一种动物。人类之所以发展出如此强悍的能力，依赖的是符号的力量。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9668f272-4802-495a-8728-e7a21cabf1dc"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dcfece84-4ef8-463b-86e3-ddcbaa5e8a55"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3月24日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9ec92b47-b9f5-4be1-a848-9ba187a286dd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"你最好学学微积分，它是上帝的语言。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d6ff4726-c317-488a-bd3f-7261a9d4b5af"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"64ab3e0e-c0e4-4487-aea3-6202577508b8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3月25日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c77324e9-ed10-4fb9-8209-17618adf2a25"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"将欲败之，必姑辅之；将欲取之，必姑与之。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"da8fd828-f72c-4f10-899e-b8e6938ba97a"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"097c3a3c-913c-40f4-aad9-611205b390e5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3月26日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"81cbdf43-e5b5-4b8b-9829-47e8b03509d8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"察人之道：居视其所亲，富视其所与，达视其所举，穷视其所不为，贫视其所不取。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7c3f3917-28e5-415a-9dfb-8239663c5e93"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a7adb591-272e-4cf2-92bb-6bda7f3a244f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3月27日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"248422ee-e3d3-422e-99fb-559a22c679de"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"工具还是拉大了人们之间的鸿沟，是否学会使用工具是人与人之间真正的差别。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"28b25c0d-515d-465b-8f4c-2bead1e22243"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9ee6d396-02de-4ff3-8890-25b718079911"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3月29日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bbb616fe-d78e-467d-aad5-793f33823c79"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"行动是治愈恐惧的良方。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0bdc7d0b-525c-4da8-b8c6-21e8c2335f54"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c4b89bfc-433a-42e7-8977-ad1132d6eebb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"3月30日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a285125e-60de-4406-b71c-5837b4dd2687"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"言者无罪，闻者足戒。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8e807be8-e1c9-4c0b-9ccf-e1533b3ac4c8"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dd0c90b7-e04d-4c17-a4e4-52b311ac5780"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"4月2日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d41f71d0-cc89-47e6-8bae-08cbfe48d4f6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人生的目的或许只是为了寻求自身的快乐，并不为别的什么东西，那些舍己为人的行为也只是为满足人们的某种幻想——实现自己所寻求的、做一名慷慨者的快乐。既然未来是不确定的，那么及时行乐应当是一种常识。是非对错只不过是两个词语，道德准则只是人们为了保护各自利益而约定的一种习俗。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5439f871-c00f-4070-a4c7-9137e1fe9a26"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"25afe868-9e4d-473a-b32a-9c7136a3c1ae"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"4月3日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"92370085-a02c-43e3-aae9-0e86c34e13d8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一个人抱持怎样的哲学观念取决于他是一个怎样的人。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"13b20b4a-02b8-4c33-b212-73194f20d275"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2ed221e7-85e4-464d-9c20-284dab3ad64a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"4月4日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1b07fa4e-21d0-4ea4-b1ce-7e74f76ab771"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有些人总是喜欢在八卦里寻找意义，又或者是在严肃内容里找寻有趣。我总想反驳他们一句，后来想想还是算了，他们还是想进步的，只不过是用错了地方。学习的时候想着玩，玩的时候又总想着要被教育。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2a109a05-c6ac-49d3-b9d6-4dfb6c4bf2b6"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"43df9bf9-88ac-484c-a929-e8e248b1c517"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"4月5日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"46c2d80a-accb-4dda-96b2-130f7ec84763"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"得人者兴，失人者崩；"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"58996fa4-2867-4470-83be-18f85a2dd908"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"恃德者昌，恃力者亡。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2a2144e8-bb66-494a-9526-dbc1d22b2bbe"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"62647eaf-26c7-4949-af29-7f62f53917fa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"4月6日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5f14d688-33d3-460b-8462-ff0e62a55173"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"什么事啊，最好得有替代方案。这个世界远比我们想象的要脆弱的多……"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"da97cf3e-7f25-4465-9ff6-22f9732691b5"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e22c5b9f-ccf4-406a-8753-b7a1b6d4f5ac"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"4月7日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7ac67029-9494-4bb3-aaad-191f5b833db7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"夫道，善用之，则百里之地可以独立；不善用之，则楚六千里而为雠人役。故人主不务得道，而广有其势，是其所以危也。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e7773cef-345c-4051-9afa-1c4e5054d0f3"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"da5b57ea-3a32-4d6c-916d-c831d14b4143"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"4月8日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3e1a5c59-9b16-4544-9854-6cded74e62b8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以前讨厌秦国，讨厌商鞅。可是真的有仔细了解当时的历史，知道一些前因后果后，也渐生佩服之心。就像其所言，常人安于故俗，学者溺于所闻。论至德者不和于俗，成大功者不谋于众。我想真正牛逼的人是不能被常人不能被时代所理解的，他们的行为和思想一定是远远超越那个时代的。"}]}]}
cards.title: 思考马克·十七（2024年三月记录）

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"3cfede5c-3c05-4966-8109-f27a1710a397","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"思考马克·十八（2024年四月记录）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9503ff03-b8b0-47e2-ad0c-1ad13a61cc7f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"4月18"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fa6e3dde-307b-4c80-af87-cec873955c95"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一个人如果说他知道他在想什么，却一时语塞，其实他并不知道自己真正在想什么。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c1116d2a-0b12-49fe-8778-1ed995621208"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"94970a68-0cdd-4efd-a539-a88a7fd5cbda"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"4月19日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f54a763f-a358-4671-bd2e-ab00e1cc6bf2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"形式会禁锢内容。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ca3dd63d-a41b-49f1-908e-1c10c26fb957"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2ebb6989-6152-41b4-900c-ecfaa12a246d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"4月20日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"122e7349-6593-4617-ae55-ed6bf3e5b3df"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这个世界很狡猾也很真诚。真诚是在于很多人可能就是因为一个共同的理想，一个兴趣爱好就走到一起成为朋友。狡猾之处在于能够成为更久的朋友有着共同的三观是不够的，往往还需要有着更多的现实利益。但不论如何，能成为彼此的朋友甚至长久的朋友都不是一件容易的事儿。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d5b6a880-4e81-48d3-9308-5ec91b3e19cc"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"84955a60-48e0-41bc-9fb6-6f329f995251"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我时常在等一篇投稿，那篇投稿可以让我任性到拒绝热点不思考流量的发出去，那便是一个编辑最希望做的事情。维护流量不仅仅是为了商业增长考量，更是为了藏在内心深处隐匿的理想。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a6c633e6-e95e-402e-81bd-b28cdbcaa9bf"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c1f8b202-4094-4de3-a5b8-fa308cc55c54"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"4月22日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ccab6dd2-4d0b-4f0a-afcb-3c24fbcf227e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们渐渐失去了讨论严肃内容的土壤，只有无止境的奶嘴娱乐才能满足人们无尽的空虚。狗屁新闻渐渐成为了如今互联网的主流，所有人在娱乐所有人。真正封锁我们的或许不是条条框框，而是用垃圾信息塞满我们每天那仅有的少许注意力。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3f2cfc3b-bf6a-4828-87f4-cff196883020"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"86051dec-3cb7-43c6-9a7c-ae00718ef32e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"4月23日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a0f23f58-b4f5-4bca-8654-bc0ad802fbe7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"虚假的影响力，你的社交账号被很多人关注；真正的影响力，你的价值观别人认同并复刻。被看见当然重要，但更重要的是得到他人认同并使人付诸行动。每个人都有在聚光灯前的五分钟，是囿于流量的死循环还是做一个更潇洒的自我，显然后者更历久弥新。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ad585e3c-e94f-4e83-b3a3-f957d9dec785"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9a155663-0e1a-48fc-ae6b-2e6e2d941c77"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"4月24日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ab611dfc-54a0-4fb6-b290-df14eac1e413"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一切都没变，一切又都变了。变了是因为熵增，没变也是因为唯一的不变也是熵增。就像王小波说的，一切都在无可挽回的走向庸俗。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ccb389c0-cc81-4b25-8590-45242f540126"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"20f1e63e-35bf-4822-b3a7-3a33bd3ef9fb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"4月25日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"db5d4ad9-8a99-4f75-865c-c1f8590a6093"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"好一个「计莫出于此」，自古以来卑鄙从来都是通行证。多少年来，都未曾变过。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"18817aaf-3244-4a0b-afa6-2a9b211176b2"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d372282a-a5e3-460b-af68-9dad52906a13"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"把一个人一生的 Highlight 都收集起来一定会很有趣，把它们做成一本书应该很受欢迎吧。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dcbcc26e-81a7-4505-ad99-d8c2ecc33eeb"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5acdb993-4e0a-4073-b95a-86a03b1231c6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"4月27日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"afdabfdd-86bb-4b36-9d54-b4b0d5dd2d2c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"靡不有初，鲜克有终。历史逃不出一个规律就是：兔死狗烹，鸟尽弓藏，敌人破，谋臣亡。但张良能做到善始善终，古今少有之。顺着潮流趋势的人易成功，打破历史规律的人才牛叉，逃脱轮回之苦的才是涅盘。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f21ec2b3-60ab-4f2b-925a-35834bfb0432"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a0e1955e-09fb-4c53-9477-cdd3f9c81648"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"4月28日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"62d2b23f-293f-4f7e-ba08-978b1a31f591"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对机器的调配和人的注意力占有能力，渐渐取代了血统和教育，成为了新的阶级区分衡量标准。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"41a2bfd1-8161-4309-b769-73b00462c4fd"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c96a527b-e9dd-48e9-81c7-d70ea3c400ed"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"4月30日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7c9ee94f-405d-428c-b49c-e0b9c095bb44"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"打败项羽的不是刘邦、不是萧何、不是张良、更不是韩信，而是项羽太爱惜自己的羽毛，不改自己的毛病，以致心态崩塌。假使刘邦面对项羽的局面一定会渡江后猥琐发育。面对困难，其实这不是逃避，而是及时改弦更张。刘邦多次只身逃亡，他总能灵活应对，而项羽受困了，就说天要亡他，或许渡江后也不一定能改变颓势，但这充分说明了西楚霸王并不是刀枪不入的。杀人诛心，其实天从没有亡他，反而给了他更多的机会，所以他不值得可怜。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"890182c0-46af-4cf8-9225-01f012aee55e"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"18673922-57b8-4caf-b2d2-16881ca47a98"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"5月4日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"40a6af56-3c7f-4f8a-b4ac-15d06503c139"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人与人之间没有感同身受，所以不要讨好别人委屈自己。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3e228321-d731-41ed-9619-397c2d9cd934"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6d18d5b8-f94e-48b4-b3ff-dcc70e1b9a23"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"5月6日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b3771b60-f4f1-459e-99b3-6d39869923b5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"大多数人都理解不了这个世界的复杂，但是芒格能，这或许就是芒格的过人之处。就像那句老话说的「对于只有锤子的人来说，每个问题都像钉子」﹝3﹞。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1323eeff-3cb6-4026-a477-29009a6121a6"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5e61a5e0-3a35-4ad4-b964-32bb81bc76d1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"5月9日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3f718062-798f-427e-94b9-db0b2ef1d2bc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人这一生归根到底拼的还是感受快乐和幸福的能力。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"06bb04d6-2aff-419d-af7c-5d9970ff8460"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"48461176-7d8e-42bd-a901-a12d60daba58"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"5月10日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"21ea1b98-99bc-4fef-ac59-fc28a6d7b38a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"看历史到底是在看什么？狡诈、奸佞、经验还是兴衰成败？我想都不是，我想是让我不要成为他们。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a3b67800-f816-420d-a9a5-45044a952510"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cf1458d9-1917-4110-abd3-9e1978bac100"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"5月12日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"aec34a1c-7682-462f-af2c-409d624dcd06"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当一件事能用机器很好的解决后，你就会发现之前刻苦努力做的那些重复性劳动是多么的自我感动。代码和算法才是人类最忠诚的杠杆。"}]}]}
cards.title: 思考马克·十八（2024年四月记录）

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"1e0ae165-7bd0-45b9-a8fa-7b2a027c89ad","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"思考马克·十九（2024年五月记录）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"07ea64e3-52fe-4c39-a130-aa501cf517b5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"5月15日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"807c8d3b-eb6b-43df-ad01-29ed0e692f1a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"你帮过的人反而不愿意帮你，帮过你的人反而更愿意帮你。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5216f165-ebb8-4c2b-afd8-91e22958d8d6"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8ec9ef46-cfdb-4f32-9412-b6f77e012ee2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"喜欢机器多于人，机器永远不会背叛你。在由1和0组成的程序世界里，对了就是对了，错了就是错了。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bbc192c8-56d9-49dc-a660-4ead18cb8986"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"40753fb9-c496-4733-972c-3cb1d65e089b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"5月16日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dbb2cf25-5d80-4287-a5ca-52d9c73f2bd5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"佛罗伦萨的真正拥有者美第奇家族。读到这儿的时候，播放器恰巧播放权力的游戏主题曲《Main Title》。艺术赞助或许是美第奇家族的烟雾弹，只有权力斗争才是真的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a2ffff91-8b5b-4843-a984-2ead40011b3a"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0d5ad5db-627b-4d9b-b300-123152f09bc1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"5月17日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"94537ab4-8d11-4a2c-8a28-35297da1ea17"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"什么事情都会有解决办法，只是我们愿不愿意付出那个代价。别人能做出来的，我们也一定能做出来。只要是人造物就没有什么魔法，只不过是现在还不熟知原理而已。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c90fb565-ee19-4a4a-87ad-2860e032da50"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e0c7a844-53c6-4fab-ba97-33bc3d716ccd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"5月18日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a9b8e52f-a34d-4de4-adf3-95d5f72a7e49"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Man is an end in himself, not a means to an end."}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0ac46a0c-dc6c-4d92-9b6a-b153dfc7b0cb"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6c7f8143-3af6-4483-a0ec-f0bef49ad0fc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"想了解任何一个人就是阅读TA公开发表的东西，而不是非得亲口去请教人家。你不能从人家发表的东西里读到些方法，便更不会从别人的嘴里得到你想要得到的东西。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a533e7f0-fd04-4efa-9e08-ff6baae829b1"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a74006af-a829-444e-9ad1-a1d3be7182e4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"用结果衡量一件事有个最大的弊端就是结果往往都有滞后性，结果并没有前瞻性。那些真正拿到结果的往往具有很强的前瞻判断力，但投机思维往往注意不到这一点。正所谓菩萨畏因，凡夫畏果。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d79a82c8-f13c-4bc3-b5d6-ffa1f2196a6f"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ac7a527c-229d-47c8-acdd-31c174c6f536"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"5月22日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1bdc0b6f-e544-453f-a07f-f48e32187f38"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一件事儿想要长久就必须包含它的对立面。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"62d2c71b-30a2-4330-b63c-8c28acb8211c"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1ba0f184-45a3-4a2c-911b-a6b5bdec70d0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"5月23日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f92b7016-5440-45ca-aa18-97f52b880e51"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"保留自己数字资产的最有效办法还是像白居易一样，他将自己的诗歌作品誊抄几份放到不同的地方异地容灾。不要相信任何一个第三方服务能靠谱的存储你的数字资产。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cb4dcff7-f967-4e49-bc5e-d7fbf7067b52"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"168ddb15-65e9-4c3a-8978-3663e45ea0e5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"忽然发现，一年前的 AI+ 产品倒了一大堆。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bf08153f-157b-4b6d-a8cf-4a332ab40a58"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"70d4eaf0-98ea-4d7f-b371-55dbd533a2b8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"5月25日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4e6f56bd-e690-4368-a4e8-be716a409671"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"文字是优美的，能讲好一个故事的人更是稀少的。菲茨杰拉德算是最杰出的那个。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4dd5dc36-3fdb-4057-9590-bacf07648825"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dc3a1e8c-9d87-40a3-ac16-ab9242171d76"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"5月26日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4f312cb7-1ae8-44d7-b302-1052d29d46ae"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人生有两次生活：一次在当下、而另一次则在回忆中。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"707c2e0f-0063-44a5-b24f-192ddf4afeb0"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d4fd8966-8520-4c06-ace3-b28c1df27513"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"5月27日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5bdcd316-e6eb-4ecf-a0bb-adfcda54cdc9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"别把自己当回事，人生会幸福很多。无论这个世界怎么样，我们都要去接受它，因为我们都太过渺小，但我们可以在有限的空间内尝试最大限度的利用。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"aaa3ab15-e5ee-4440-840f-39bd470da893"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d7ecebc2-8976-4c66-95f3-b5e4d4e082db"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"5月28日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7f8859ad-d4ce-479e-a055-016bd70f4703"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"或许知行合一，没那么复杂和难以理解。它希望我们“诚实”，对自己诚实，对他人也诚实。曾以为诚实有什么难的？可越来越发现，能做到诚实的人少之又少。假话和面具已经习以为常了，想要摘下它们很难，因为连着骨头带着筋。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b58cc142-3530-4a71-b6bd-af985c70c4f2"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a7b05dc9-f949-4914-b8d5-eb4d3505cd83"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"任何一种信息，只要它是信息，就是会遭受“耗散”。写在莎草纸上的希腊罗马典籍一旦没有志同道合的后继者传承，很快就会朽坏，最终被人所淡忘。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"afe762f2-b5d1-4da2-9965-fcbef44f7bc2"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"15576136-4f2d-488b-be82-8ea29eb68207"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"5月29日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"990f5427-edf1-463a-8acb-fde2d551589f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这个世界似乎从来不缺少好的回答者，而是缺少一个能让人自由发挥讨论的议题。怎么让沉默的大多数感兴趣，怎么让大家有动力去分享一直是难的，再大的平台也永远缺少优质内容。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5c749418-6e6a-48fa-8d8d-c2ebfd216224"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"378f97b5-9f71-4979-931f-c25d8e70c2d4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"6月5日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"665f7dbb-b3c1-4978-a0fd-dc0da5288328"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"经济持续下行，已经明显感觉到这五年前后的舆论环境已经越来越崩坏了。经济基础不仅决定上层建筑，而且深刻的影响着信心和舆论环境。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9e205625-26d9-4290-ba30-f3a9bea2bd0c"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"04082c74-53c6-4858-b0f8-630c564b9042"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所有的创新最后都会回归到成本。决定产品的不是创新，而是成本。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"14cd7080-dccd-4c51-ab39-83b4ad8bb9b7"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b3cf7abf-1518-47b8-b9c1-e1dbfa93705f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Knowlege isn't free, You have to pay attention."}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"17fd1509-d332-4cbc-9a0a-ffd0600e47e8"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e097e132-5b28-44de-93ab-1617a4887bb7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"6月6日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6e626a51-61f2-40b1-8d50-87aee83bdf7b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"媒体是一面镜子，它映出人性的丑恶和社会之阴暗。以前我以为给人自由人会很好的发挥，现在则不然。这就好比枪在好人手里，它是防御坏人的武器；但倘若在坏人手里，它对全社会都是巨大的威胁。什么土壤孕育什么样的人。总之，天黑了，没有任何一个人是无辜的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"73805d19-712a-4370-917b-60c1a837ab47"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"78ff5600-0a38-453f-85d5-abff0b4c193b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"富在术数，不在劳身；利在势居，不在力耕。圣人因天时，智者因地财，上士取诸人，中士劳其形。两千年前的御史大夫早已经通晓财富必须源于杠杆了，比纳瓦尔整整早了两个世纪﹝8﹞。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b4346733-c871-4cd7-91f6-825706886257"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"88bfe3ee-215e-47d1-b53d-655520e52076"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"6月8日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"222231e8-0444-48c5-bb97-96aef5f09279"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"拿到结果又怎样？放以前10w+我确实会开心好久，但现在真的开心不起来了。虽说人是万物的尺度，但是这尺度真的是有价值的吗？也许我不该在这大众传播的内容中寻找什么价值。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"94a1575f-6c04-4878-9217-e31da6d459ea"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5e1024ec-884e-431a-9507-99b0d449b8a6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"6月10日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b1ea7048-5ec4-4f9b-9e83-85c038e71967"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"曾经那个开放包容，熟悉的世界正在悄悄的离我们远去..."}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e2851e05-f606-47de-be32-0cb38a409fcb"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0ac518e2-6a1f-4458-bacf-542e51143340"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"从各家巨头纷纷转向算法推荐就足以说明前几年所谓「私域流量」的说法是多么荒谬。在信息爆炸的时代，「人找内容」已不具备强竞争力，而应该是「内容找人」也就是做好「内容投喂」。如今在算法的加持下「好内容」永远都不缺少流量，所以「能变现的内容」变得愈发重要。博主们都在人潮涌动的十字路口，寻求那个能转换个人命运的红绿灯。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b25f4c30-8cf2-4708-84ef-9acfbe53d78b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cf6358be-d728-413e-a4a3-1e4af3ff457e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"6月12日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f884216d-f9cc-4ea3-8a8c-3b0b5d6d39b6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"语言的诞生和进化，其实是为了更好的聊八卦。"}]}]}
cards.title: 思考马克·十九（2024年五月记录）

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"9a8fc35b-faf3-4dcc-bb0d-0c025118a8fe","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"思考马克·二十（2024年六月记录）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ed870ee3-5324-4992-8b56-2ec14fb372fe"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"6月14日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5554f6d7-0d29-4403-a8de-1d09ea2bc089"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"运营没有玄学，相信数据的力量。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2b692379-254a-427b-aa32-4de6f79ad239"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c1796842-ae61-408d-88f0-11fcf72f511b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"6月16日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7fc61e32-c0b5-4c25-a9d9-a9a530a9c9b0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"免费的内容都是有代价的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"57076f09-c595-4644-a39f-990283120bf9"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1357ebcf-89de-4295-b401-a4ce9705c7ae"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"6月20日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2a387fc2-7686-490d-bcb8-a0bda335ef04"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"千万不要想能在互联网上寻找到什么真知灼见，能被算法推荐的大部分都是情绪化的内容，这不是平台能决定的，更不是一两个人决定的。互联网是牛羊的暴政，如果想成为猛兽你需要独行。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5cac7578-8f1f-4c32-833b-54b6801d96c1"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e7720e45-cc6e-4a7f-a240-586a9c9d6fce"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"6月25日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"078c73bc-8a79-4d18-8dbd-5de8a57d07ad"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"看一个产品做的好坏，去看它的产品文档就能一目了然。优秀产品的文档通常写的非常清晰明了。所以，优秀和追求完美从来都是一种习惯，偏执狂才能做出好产品。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"264708ec-d4ae-45fa-8960-e674ac8fac12"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"befbbe6c-da67-45bc-9f7a-341bb2d60034"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"6月26日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3637c1be-418c-42f2-90b7-8cf345f0cd69"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一个观察并不一定对，如何判断一所大学的好坏？我想最直接的就去看毕业典礼上该校的领导、教授和校友们的发言。如果充斥着假话、大话、空话，这个学校多半不太行。倘若毕业典礼上一些领导学者敢公开发表一些相对真挚真诚的话，我想这所大学的风气会蛮好的。公司组织也同理。一所务实的学校、一家务实的公司、一个务实的团队，未来的发展不会太差。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c69d07d9-b89b-43c4-8507-8e96f5493f76"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3c8d33e4-91ad-4df7-8cc1-5421aa203d81"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"6月27日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"427683a9-b803-4194-9dca-353f8a12fbbe"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"越美丽的东西，越鲜艳的东西，就越危险！颜色也是，人也是！"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f2a4efbd-03b0-4f35-b0e0-7cf4a9a37369"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6c8da06a-b2ae-43a3-82ae-bac39a38a5a7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"6月30日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fd7c3093-1ff9-4433-b082-4db4404bfc3f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"手感是特别奇妙的东西，也是特别重要的东西，很多时候说不清理由，但是那种确定性会给人带来舒适。手感大概也是一种算法。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1bb3e49b-9593-4f7d-b972-25131035adac"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0db3acf3-f24b-4513-94e6-ead9820b8049"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"7月2日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5435bdbf-f2fa-438d-a7ea-400e8feeb48f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"很少看到优秀的序，但这个序，写的非常好。一看写序的两位作者，果然是大牛。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"42514d45-b1f5-40dd-90a3-6687adc09305"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0f5e3399-0cd4-4e11-b112-f1fc7279459e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"7月3日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"24fd12b1-3e42-4d6e-be5d-63c98792e5d7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人的年龄越大越趋近于保守。年轻人没有什么资产自然更关注分配问题所以更左，可是当你接触了社会现实后，人会明白如何要奋力坚守自己的所得的时候，你自然会变得保守，因为你不再年轻了。所以大多数时候都是屁股决定脑袋，利益决定立场。保守主义和进步主义似乎不是对立的，而可能是人生的不同阶段。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"957b1f45-2190-483b-ad42-0ecfc4426628"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c29e4a37-4d86-435f-b834-71a11309ef94"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"7月4日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"248bacb1-18cc-4e75-a4c0-e46f9500be9d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人的努力在大趋势面前有多脆弱？经济危机那几年毕业的大学生，要花费多少年时间，才能赶上经济繁荣期毕业的大学生？诺奖经济学得主克鲁格曼的回答是“Never”。繁荣有重回之时，但人无再少年。只要被时代的一粒沙击中又有几人能真正的上岸。或许现在拼的不是财富不是官阶而是心态了，前几十年的高速发展才不是历史的常态。就像《红楼梦》结尾的那句“陋室空堂，当年笏满床。衰草枯杨，曾为歌舞场”。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fe3efb1e-d7b8-4ef4-a680-2762da1604b7"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"86229733-3834-49d7-ad6b-06dadef11e5e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"7月5日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5fec6311-7c63-45c1-9985-6e8a7d8682e0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人生的一个重要课题就是要学会拒绝。利用你的人不曾真正感激你的善良，更多时候他们只是想得寸进尺。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2d9a8fca-c515-4574-beed-a24c7978882b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ebe977cf-986e-4ff3-95dc-006d483a8e08"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"7月6日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"996e899a-e447-4703-96de-dccd17a2b0c2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"语言是把利剑，但这把剑不是用来刨腹自证的。不要过度解释，因为从你诉苦的那一刻就已经彻底输了。脏水洗身的时刻要谨记，狮子不会因为狗叫而回头。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"98aac048-dac6-4db9-84a9-a7548e101c17"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8c71666d-a2ac-49e9-aa72-c00b2047a2d7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"7月7日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7ce3d533-f3cb-4128-ad31-d01868b6cbe0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"读书人的尖酸刻薄，王小波排第一，钱钟书排第二。虽然二者的方式方法不尽相同，王小波直接，钱钟书含蓄。但他们那种精确的辛辣的讽刺却无一例外。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4b1786f7-70e3-4cf3-a6b2-cea7f1261fba"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"231614f9-6b3b-474b-9176-b729eba1b737"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"7月11日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"77b9b725-9d0d-4e21-a5ed-67054c067728"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我喜欢这个时代，这个时代的人都现实。宏大叙事渐渐失去了市场，虽然依然有人还把它奉为圭臬。用宏大叙事来堵底层人的嘴，然后大言不惭的教导人们要懂得吃苦是不道德的。要记得中国人不信奉印度教，这个社会没有永远的刹帝利。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ed934089-dbe5-4336-9f21-54e408035fb5"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c0097d5f-41ca-4851-a657-1cd25773510f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"7月12日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e61aaa26-ce22-4892-9de4-8213ef4eee8c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"读完《围城》，难过了好一阵。不知道是在惋惜方鸿渐和唐晓芙的爱情，还是在哀叹他和孙柔嘉的婚姻，抑或是对方鸿渐一地鸡毛的学业和职业生涯的共情。思来想去，发现这本书吸引我的并不是方鸿渐、赵辛楣等主人公之间的故事，而是钱钟书对知识分子虚伪的批判、对上层社会辛辣的讽刺、对当时社会现实的哲理思考。细腻的文笔下，形象描绘了人生处处的围城。生存竞争让人渐渐脱去文饰和面具，露出它原本的毒辣。"}]}]}
cards.title: 思考马克·二十（2024年六月记录）

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"720e59fc-3221-4b0c-bd6f-4f663e9055eb","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"思考马克·二十一（2024年七月记录）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8cbb7cdc-4ed2-47c8-b5a6-2651a2b51faf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"7月16日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9f6ba9dd-691a-4112-b00e-f08f419c2057"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"快速成功的方法只有一个就是快速失败。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b832a87b-4a81-4691-ac70-f0f9c8785f60"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3082d19f-5cec-4b97-8591-631a7fecf5b4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"7月17日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cdd77a7a-cd37-4e92-a2e1-8285c1e09402"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"假如人生活在一种无力改变的痛苦之中，就会转而爱上这种痛苦，把它视为一种快乐，以便使自己好过一些。人是一种会自己骗自己的动物。大多数人不会意识到是吃了很多无益的苦，并且虚掷了不少青春年华，他们反而会觉得这种经历是无比崇高和必要的。无价值的吃苦和无代价的牺牲大抵如此。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4d7498fe-2ff2-47e1-a0c8-f6c58e8df0e6"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fa50879b-421d-4a6f-b942-f37bc188eb96"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"7月18日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"beec9c01-551d-42d5-86a8-2d421c1a7459"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"俄罗斯人确实挺乐观的，昨晚突降大雨，我撑伞都几乎淋了个半湿。路遇到几个俄罗斯人他们没撑伞在雨中奔跑，其中一位小哥跟我开心的说了句话。由于我不懂俄语，不知道他在表达什么，但是看他那种近乎天真的开心模样，我也象征性打了一个国际友好手势。在恶劣环境下成长的人们似乎从骨子里就有一种乐观精神。可惜不会俄语，否则真的蛮想和他交个朋友。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"58613bbf-5a3e-4cfc-8a3b-bb7dd6f6fc9b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"96d70e30-957b-4652-a2f7-690805873306"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"7月19日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"57efb65d-3a8a-4029-80a8-ff6a7c5f9783"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以前文化水平低的人都生怕自己露怯，而现在随着素质教育的普及让一群“文盲”识字了。然而最大的弊端就是，他们会用他们有限的词语来到处炫耀自己的无知。或许我们新时代需要对文盲重新下个定义了。不是识了字的就不是“文盲”，是到处炫耀自己没文化的人才是“文盲”。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0ffc0e0b-5b95-4cd9-81da-467ae41b55f1"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6a8b8d99-f700-42c1-bd2c-132bf4ac29b7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"7月20日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a33d02ea-b532-496b-907b-81cbfb7d1d8a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"别把他人的伤痛当作玩笑，真正的伦理原则是把人人同等看待。人既不是天使，也不是禽兽。但不幸在于，那些该表现为天使的时刻，有些人却表现为禽兽。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5327dce9-5663-4123-8d78-5f25f8dadce3"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0ba635e3-db61-4359-8a83-8f51ba97404b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"7月22日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f880b035-d22a-42fc-89f0-dd20ba708678"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"《梳毛》这本书读完并不开心，或许是因为在读的过程中我对它的结尾抱有太高的期待。这本书让我更了解了自我，也对人类进化有了不同的视角。人类进化的过程并不完美，甚至有些东西华而不实，我们也并非是上帝塑造完美的生物。但运用语言的方式，决定了我们和“上帝”的距离，更决定了我们人生的边界。你可以用它来聊八卦，可以用它来交朋友，甚至你可以用它来“搭便车”欺骗他人。理解社会远比认识物质世界复杂的多。但语言也不是万能的，有时候老办法反而更深刻，这大概就是听其言观其行吧。相信直觉，肯为彼此“梳毛”的人才更值得信任。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7147dd3f-fd4a-4d23-b350-dd8bd2a09c3a"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5aaab3b7-268c-4ce3-8a9c-d20944102d07"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"7月24日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fea77281-a8b7-4468-9868-6308fdca2805"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"现如今 UGC 入口太多了，甚至有点过剩。谁都上来说一嘴的结果就是信息噪声越来越大，情绪化内容越来越多，PGC 专业内容越发难以出圈以致日渐萎缩，所以书籍仍然是这个时代获取高质量信息的重要方式。几十年前的人们或许不曾想象，互联网高度发达的结果就是，垃圾内容越来越多，有见地的人也越来越沉默。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cd825787-4a49-4aba-9e9c-7e12b739ecac"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7cb1c6d1-41db-4bcd-b91f-4ae2141afc4b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"7月25日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5e8eaccf-c32b-4711-b06d-c4c5f7e58c7a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如果当时多了解些历史，是不是会少些盲从的愤怒。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8ac887fb-317c-48a2-b712-afb8453d7072"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2126f329-ead3-47cb-ad3f-ba9e3f13d5c6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"7月28日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"886e8fbe-08ae-4277-8cf7-6c6da66a296d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"现在的人被算法投喂的已经烂掉了，算法投喂就像百年前的鸦片一样已经开始积恶成疾了。狗血的内容有人会说一定是假的，相对正经的有人会说太无聊了、讨论多的话题会说你是故意引战、没讨论的还会说这么没意思的你也发，凡此种种吧……算法投喂是趋势也是让人们分裂的源头，凡事都达不成共识，公说公有理，婆说婆有理。不是理解的“理”，而是不讲道理的“理”。终于这盛世，用算法把每个人都鼓励成了大傻逼。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"73c541fc-e934-486d-9c8c-3c03d92f06ec"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"171d7260-8903-4122-ab99-13204403b03a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"7月29日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"231957f0-25f1-41a9-be13-8dc53995bb54"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"时事政治是男人的八卦，它不比聊那个爱豆明星更高级，本质上也是一种信息娱乐。目前人类信息已经泛娱乐化。对于绝大多数普通人了解美国谁当总统只是信息载入，并不能提高个人对世界的理解力。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"40d6d4b8-2274-46de-8c48-8477f4524207"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b0ee44a3-f046-4b7b-a2d8-d7a17fec9243"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"8月1日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"985b22d9-cdeb-4681-b730-8a1a63c7b097"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"商人或许比政客更有理想主义，成功的企业家采访表面聊的是商业，但本质上都是其人生价值理想的现实实现。而政客们嘴上聊的都是国家理想，究其本质上都是生意都是选票。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a62347f0-cf5b-49d0-87af-2deea6410192"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"12d5d13d-607f-491c-b3e9-38a1acf86b3d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"8月4日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"37f36307-c79a-4a76-9e1f-88092fa25081"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"现代社会人们总是花了太多时间在关注别人，其实应该把更多的时间和精力花在自己身上。放以前，确实不能只关注自己还要抬头看天；但现在，乱花迷人眼群魔乱舞各种烟雾弹，还不如多花心思关心关心自己。想要摸清趋势要在史书里找，而不是在热搜里找。历史大事，近看不如远观。凡人之智，能见已然，不能见将然。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8440e12b-0cce-486b-8331-f3f5ca5a8da2"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bb9e3cfe-f0f0-42c6-a785-e8f829e73a93"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"8月5日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1f7b775d-7887-4887-aac6-c11bf3c30a37"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"You can't control the wind but you can adjust the sail."}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5434e54a-3d18-4c70-b0bb-c3ed4b1f24c0"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"72cdb465-7fc5-4149-92b1-2edd65c2c991"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"8月7日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c0940a4c-39b5-45d6-99d7-a88c711f0fd2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"富人家孩子有两种，一种特别单纯的，一种情商特别高的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"001db077-fd60-4894-bf9f-2ed3745ddfc8"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dfa69b3b-82bd-4b61-9769-79b7084387e5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"8月8日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"98f0fcf1-edf6-4893-a2a2-fa8a20eeae6b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们要坦然接受一个全民自媒体，却又没有新闻的时代。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a8c84701-bf94-46bc-820e-9a56f6c8cb1c"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"378aa7d9-dec6-4330-9ea8-be837fb22427"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"8月9日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7197e8c3-bd16-45ce-9e6e-af708761c211"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"互联网上的绝大部分应用都不是创新，而是杠杆。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9589dbc9-5701-40b7-922d-da850e646251"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ee15dcde-2bb3-4f33-bcdd-3d7bc73a6bca"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"8月12日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e2dfff18-e67e-4f10-bbab-ff28ac7d8108"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"道德是一种特别奇怪的事物，你做的比别人好的时候别人会说你古板刻薄道德感太高。而当你做的不如别人的时候某些人又会瞧不起你。在大多数没有经过伦理教育的人眼里，道德的标准有且只有自己。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0038c663-5ccc-4e0d-b560-98267fa41997"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e1cc3872-fc69-488c-9673-97479cfb1e87"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"8月14日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c792ff0b-a0d4-438c-afe3-ad67fd4e8434"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这几年做运营和产品，Owen 影响我最多，也给我帮助最多。一开始我觉得他很执拗，但是后来我才知道一个人的原则对于一个人的塑造有多大的影响。一直以来我都在向他学习，他的想法点子和执行力，在我认识的技术人员里都是独树一帜的存在。不知道这里多少人用过他的“沉浸式翻译”，但是我依稀记得他做出来介绍给我用的时候，我那种眼前一亮的欣喜感。真正热爱产品的人不多，有自己原则和思想的人就更少了。每次都能在他的身上学到很多好东西。"}]}]}
cards.title: 思考马克·二十一（2024年七月记录）

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"020294fc-8fda-49dc-bd59-5a1af1998eba","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"思考马克·二十二（2024年八月记录）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ebd3c26f-6263-432b-8f39-bc4d7a99b310"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"8月18日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5bc2869c-577f-4928-8428-956286920d9b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"consistency+discipline+patience= mindset"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"86f17cdf-490a-4bbb-a5b2-5559e205d538"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5418c6b3-c9e6-4a56-be7a-1a73d68ee8ca"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"8月21日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dd0a2e21-d3c5-4885-80ac-5468f4d96e06"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"青年人看不到希望，只能发泄在网上。互联网是他们为数不多可以寻求个人存在感的地方了。可悲吗？当然，但是他们又能怎么样呢..."}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"27543028-08d7-427d-9558-55c456b27132"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3cfe7965-ef1f-4b45-94ab-b1a3398f8ec1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"8月22日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ac33c50c-15d4-41df-8d82-f3a6e1a5b331"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"钱从某种程度上说也是一种选票，所以成功的商人也能变为成功的政治家。但成功的政治家在伦理角度上讲并不被允许成为成功的商人。权力和金钱本是一体两面。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c9fe84a2-d14c-4f99-9194-9e310d70b1f0"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"751e0293-d882-4ea4-98df-3b5181d543d7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"8月23日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ddcde96a-8dff-4739-a660-6c6ad719077c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"太笨的人能力不行，太聪明的人又总想走捷径，只有不太笨又偏执的人才能做出优秀的产品。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4518635a-9d4b-4dc3-839b-56a1ad56a817"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6a1d8567-3232-42b3-b4bc-8103520b5b42"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"8月26日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6a15f2f8-d411-4282-9aa8-4c666182bc51"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"《悉达多》被推荐种草了好久，今天一口气读完。黑塞把佛陀分成乔达摩和悉达多两人，用前后各种因果轮回对比，用悉达多年轻的傲慢和年老的宁静做对比，写作手法确实非常独特。感觉这故事很多都源自《金刚经》等佛教哲学经典，就像书中最后表达悉达多的若见诸相非相，也就成佛了。人需要在自我否定后，去认识人生，去认识世界，去认识自我。当你觉得“我”不是我，Being不是真的存在后，才能真正的认识自我。也就是《金刚经》的三句义：佛说世界，即非世界，是名世界。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a6bc403d-3811-47cb-abb5-92cebdfec07d"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"451ab506-997f-426f-8f9a-cadd6d7e7af9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"8月27日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d2063d5b-1429-407f-92e1-ffedcd5be043"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人必须保持持续进步，否则就会被经验捆绑，成为过往的囚徒。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d72dd7ab-9aab-487d-98a9-8f413a5a3386"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4748cde0-a40c-496d-9231-c43a58ff3800"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"8月29日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b82bc320-0a92-4d20-9c62-6d3200193b5e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"猫猫才是掌握进化精髓的动物，这或许才是进化的意义，人类终究是走错了方向。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"62bb56de-1545-4f3c-b18d-5bc7949b96fc"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c6860e5d-bd37-4f64-b2f3-f3443151b533"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"8月31日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"26ec1d8c-c9f0-4ff5-b317-d29cf155e14e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"没有人能看清他者的路，无数的历史表明，十恶不赦的人或许通向神圣，善良的人或许最终走进苦难。人独自行过生命，蒙受玷污，承担罪过，然后再苦苦寻觅出路。有些人就算再怎么努力挣扎，也不能扭转命运的一丝一毫。接受这个世界的荒谬，远比改变它更为艰难。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cc2fbaba-4340-4318-ac9a-6474ecc97ca5"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e013e9a3-1afc-4c90-bb63-bafc9e5c2a34"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"9月1日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1be9c8f2-7e45-4c28-a2d3-9e36ff25a1ca"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有时候其实大家不是多希望小红书赢，是受够了互联网下半场的悲观预期。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"009fa721-bae0-4498-bc28-39f175922d0d"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dc098e24-5c64-4332-8556-3be3aae8644f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"9月2日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bbdf6dc6-a818-44ac-b1e0-0e84f66d85b6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"良心经常以沉默的方式来表达。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ef757f80-71f3-4211-b320-5d718db252d9"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"793f546e-0f26-422f-9cfb-02c1c9854704"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"9月5日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"67dea146-4445-4ecc-8da3-c4311e24c4eb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"秩序感是国人骨子里的基因，即便是一个当代标榜自由的中国人也很难接受一个自由无序混乱的社会。或许是人口众多的原因，人们骨子里会讨厌不遵守规则的人。中国人的自由观是一种秩序之下的自由，侧面来讲人们也不喜欢“真实”，人们喜欢听赞美的话，听阿谀奉承的话。人之情多矫，世之俗多伪。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"81f7a110-d0a5-4a88-99a0-f42198a300b8"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"32a65457-c57b-4e60-9296-7c5c6d90c8b4"},"content":[{"type":"text
