了，未来不确定，那么每个人都可能会成为叶文洁的粉丝。就像3I/ATLAS一样，它是不是星际飞船已经不那么重要了，但由此产生的末日崇拜现象，远比世界末日可怕的多……"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5a69c89c-ba20-4339-b1c4-a584c70505be"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"eeacadf0-9f55-43f9-9138-dfde26a6c79e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"经常骗人的人会觉得全世界都是骗子。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cb159574-fc63-4d63-919d-9e610e0bc19b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a98fc9a4-e185-4af4-a042-c8d44b24861a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"10月27日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1793b4b5-0453-4a5c-8e2a-68ab14f6b3a0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我特别讨厌一切唯流量论的用户，我该如何证明我不是为了流量？难道用大家都不感兴趣的内容证明，那样他也不会刷到，甚至很多人都不愿意点开。流量是双刃剑也是反光镜，反射的是人本身的欲望。你要证明我是错的，你最好证明你是对的。你当然可以怀疑他人做事的动机，但如果把任何事的讨论都归因于动机不纯，终究会掉进自己给自己编织的幻象中。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6ff16735-3a01-479e-8f56-ff454a5ba31a"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3e153568-982a-4ea1-9715-1aa537192b0a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"10月28日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"02cded8e-6ea9-4afe-b6b4-a4be674c10e0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"越来越觉得这个世界是匹配的游戏，而不是改变的游戏。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d5e9abc3-4d7b-4088-a399-5525bf19db5a"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"99fec822-427a-475b-97f2-73be331a49f9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"10月29日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"808a32e1-1792-46f5-aed7-574a4f310ee1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"《一战再战》简直是本年度最佳。它嘲讽了左派的软弱、右派的扭曲、革命的背叛、恰到好处的配乐诉说着性与暴力场面。在人性面前，任何性取向、种族、身份认同、政治立场，都是毫无意义的标签。最终拯救世界的还得是拉美人民游刃有余从从容容的游击斗争，Power To The People."}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ad19cdce-edcb-42db-aeb6-8aeece7aef17"},"content":[{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"text","text":"10月30日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"16ab759a-1f92-4b58-9ee6-d39e40a5e0bd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"七年之后攻守易形了，川普也开始说G2了。川普告诉我们一个朴素的道理，不要做一个软弱的人，要做一个强者。这世界始终是一个强者收割弱者的游戏。人可以选择善良，但这种善良不应该乞求来自他人的施舍。而是我有能力消灭你，但我选择不那么做。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3cd68c15-c06c-4a08-967b-b6758d1e7257"},"content":[{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"text","text":"11月1日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2f70f44e-a2b6-44c6-9457-509eb878d713"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"20后是通过屏幕认识世界的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9a75f614-e5fe-4dfb-8d3c-04396534cfda"},"content":[{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"text","text":"11月2日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"47881f82-36eb-4af1-a896-1009511173fd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在当今社会，感情是最廉价的东西，也是最奢侈的东西。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"172d5c55-6dc0-4af5-b09d-3021fdc8ec15"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0482b076-f80d-458f-9922-4657449dd4e0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月3日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8ca665fd-a233-4fb3-8776-e1dd4a23040f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一想到未来人类都是在消费 AI 生产的内容就难过，我们离全预制内容越来越近了。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e29e8311-ff31-4cc8-bac0-df22d3711288"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fca37356-111f-4e84-a1fa-a870d350800c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"笔记软件加开屏广告实在是太恶心了，对，我说的就是锤子便签——老罗最后的裤衩。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"04a28d1e-dbbf-42e7-8dec-d81357aae1c5"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ca6eab3c-a925-4b3f-b3cb-d76b647c59f4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月8日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"03ff5b9c-9229-4124-8ecc-af2b695c6f3e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"内容市场如同消费市场。人不仅以食物为食，人还以信息为食。大众口味是会变化的，甚至大众也会跟风去吃一件东西。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"45a26c6c-9bdc-423d-9d21-2d0ab7706270"},"content":[{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"text","text":"11月10日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bbdb6f23-223c-4263-9423-9edea3fe2520"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"经济下行，让人堕落。孔子说，富贵不能淫，贫贱不能移，威武不能屈。其实孔子的很多教诲都是要反着听的。也就是说，人穷容易丧志，人富容易淫乱，为官者容易躺平。人在没有希望的时候，心理和行为上会容易产生沉沦。就像草东唱的，社会是个染缸，缸里有梦想，缸底有烂账。只是看谁先游向欲望……"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c6601c2e-2dd9-4103-a976-69424a09f338"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2e7ceaaa-8d36-4a8c-badd-d4181fb8de64"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"做无聊的事，就是有趣的人。"},{"type":"hard_break"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"650eb337-802d-43de-a3df-74c8a85c3216"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月11日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6dfa7738-a31c-403a-b4f3-8fc85a29a738"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"要到有鱼的地方去钓鱼。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"292db25c-0ba8-4e04-a03b-7f5e464a8f1a"}}]}
cards.title: 思考马克·三十三（2025年十月记录）

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"551c6333-9f3c-4a82-a87d-8bb04a3df0d5","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"strong"}],"text":"思考马克·三十四（2025年十一月记录）"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1b9dd66c-970a-43a4-86b8-43a07b03510a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月14日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5b074c49-f268-44f4-bebf-63eeb9d12840"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我给他们争取了自由，他们却用自由做了些什么呢？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c093113a-8ea8-41c6-a380-1cf4f4e485d9"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e244e3e3-9c3c-47df-a675-ffa7c40fc8d3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月15日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c1c4817e-9161-4cc4-a9db-a467ca33b286"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人总是要经历点遗憾和刻苦铭心，才能写出那么多感人至深的话。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7c7c5b77-805c-4802-9728-0943b34a9952"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1eee0132-04e7-4ca3-9696-dfbb18545ad7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月16日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cad23592-8660-4cfc-a0b5-8d0d7930f52e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在互联网社交媒体高度发达的今天，拥抱高质量小共同体、远比亲近低质量混沌的大空间要好。远离大众自古以来都是一种睿智的自我保护生存策略。这样不仅能活得开心，其次还因注意力宝贵，没必要把生命浪费在跟无关人的辩驳上。人从来都不可能因为他人的几句话就能被改变的，每个人都有自己的命数，改变别人干嘛呢？不要天真的以为改变别人，别人就会感激你。最重要的是要减少招致他人怨恨，而取悦他人，是最好的方式。但如若不想说假话，那最好的方式就是保持沉默。"},{"type":"hard_break"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3d43a87d-c2ee-4a94-953b-41799c8a2cb5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月18日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4a5b326c-b93f-48f7-b6f6-0a08b96317cb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"毛的实践论是我目前看到的对知行合一最好的、最全面的、最透彻的分析。王阳明和毛都意识到了，如果想要做成事，就必须去实践和认识相结合。仅有经验是不够的，要把感性的经验抽象成方法论，然后用这个方法论去继续指导实践，继而修正迭代方法论。人很难仅通过理论去实现理想，也不能仅通过做事而无方法的去盲目实践，当知和行达到统一后，方能说接近了真理，这就是辩证唯物的认识论。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cb2384c6-5eba-4427-b127-28cebe99bcd0"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6581fb24-7b36-4a83-8ea9-953ad01b4a48"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月19日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d52b1b02-cf92-4688-9f3e-9ab32b9a7ca8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"推荐有价值的内容和推荐有流量的内容是两个逻辑。热闹吸睛并不等于价值。真正的价值在于人们是否愿意掏真金白银，用钱投票才是真需求。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1544990e-219a-4bc4-8802-450063433364"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"252a6955-da7e-41c7-a5f7-fb4c3a69bdde"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月20日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"042cb4bf-3cf0-4dcc-baa0-607fa7465a8f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"女性天生比男性共情能力要强，所以在这个信息爆炸、充满负面戾气和焦虑的时代，女性要比男性痛苦很多。女性更愿意阅读文字而不是通过视觉化去感受世界。这或许生物演化因素有关，女性常活在“幻想”里，而男性则能活在“视觉”里。英雄难过美人关，女性需要更多安全感。而如今大家越来越没有阅读的耐心了……注意力稀缺的时代，人类终究进入到了属于我们的“25号宇宙”时刻。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3c189775-3177-4557-b416-121ff26ba570"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2ad8e8ba-7146-4699-a494-9e1fca2a3299"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"现在 AI 媒体们的标题党程度，已经毫不逊色于传统媒体了……大家为了争夺注意力也是拼了。信息爆炸的当下，用户越来越没有耐心的时代，流量成了最廉价的东西，也成了最贵的东西。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"74739d98-0d8e-48ee-9a4e-b8f78c6e19a2"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"20a7c00e-ebf9-4224-9d98-4e05eede4a9f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月21日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b2bd161c-27fb-4d99-a2e8-06d2aad94454"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"重要的不是你拥有什么，而是你的感受是什么。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5c7e829d-197f-4861-93af-cf9469c5027f"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0733f7a3-1d5c-4e87-bbb0-ac1a5d46850a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月23日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"378becaa-e0ca-4ccf-9aee-d3e08479b5e2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"之前也去了几次天安门但从未想过去看看老人家，这次去之前还是又仔细翻了翻毛选，作为新中国的领袖以及精神领袖，我们都必须承认，老人家从未离我们远去。这几年陆陆续续看了些老人家的著作，从《早期文稿》到《选集》，再到一些反对者对于老人家的批评等等。不论是崇拜还是批判他，都有一群巨大的拥趸。但不论如何，你都必须承认他开创了一个不一样的时代，我有时会想，我们活在毛的时代会怎样呢？或许，人们不会丢失狂热吧。因为他太有魅力了不是吗……但也别忘了老人家曾说过，数风流人物，还看今朝。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"72f3df18-b1e0-4b3e-b74b-81fc964f30d5"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7e6bd0e9-a7cd-4691-98c4-7193723c2481"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月27日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2a98d0f6-dc7c-4bee-8f9e-abaa4afb5596"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"杭州就是中国的加州。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b3e75152-7fb3-4275-bd72-7c17bbfbcb03"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3795b4e1-7c1e-452d-a13f-13eeb09b0470"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月28日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c565855e-e1a9-4138-b0fb-482252ef0c19"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人需要活在希望中，那怕那希望是虚无缥缈的。但还需认清现实，因为实现理想的过程需要脚踏实地。仰望星空当然会发现自我的渺小与局限，但渺小从不是没有力量，不积跬步，无法达到灵山。回看来时路时，我们终究会怀念当初的时光，这是人性的复杂和矛盾性。目标很重要，但我们体验的永远是过程，而非结果。结果是给人看的，感受是自己的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"22c41e72-50e2-4905-a3c8-a96d5acf673d"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"87441040-27fb-4c15-83cd-834cb1384934"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月29日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e928aca2-b3fc-4fa7-9565-ccafb7854ba7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"慕强的底层逻辑是缺乏安全感。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"11a45bc9-727c-4e4f-8ee4-fdc04775f9fb"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2f4f2ed0-9d84-4f22-b573-a4fe6153dfb6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月30日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c208db46-cd9c-4d03-8ea3-4207d6a2d1f3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以前特别烦大学生在评论区发抽象表情包，觉得特别乱，也没有实际讨论价值。但是不知不觉我现在每天就喜欢在看他们发的抽象表情包，每次看到都觉得特别有趣憋不住笑。果然，人这种动物什么都能适应。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7e8162a0-42d6-48b5-8850-f77b4f00610c"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4afbaba9-b855-40b1-8610-892d0790e7b4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月1日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"39e6f0bd-2b7b-4f8b-b447-240a6b2d3215"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"终于明白了什么是“看万山红遍，层林尽染……万类霜天竞自由”。湖南人的浪漫主义和乐观的精神状态，以及整座城市浓浓的烟火气和活人感，真是非常吸引人的。也解开了诸多疑惑，为什么许多革命领袖出生在湖南——没有这些地域环境派生出来的性格，是无法在每天都充满不确定性的革命年代存活下来并成就一番事业的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e8bc9da7-32c0-40dc-9a9a-bec445ce51c7"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7512d281-4143-4735-8885-aaed9383f79c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"11月2日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8e7ca89b-dcd1-4fbd-acfd-38b7b864fa1c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"渤海深处写满了不甘。"},{"type":"hard_break"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f4b5d2d4-4370-48c6-9ef3-3156db96d75f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月4日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"95685b05-361e-4039-a453-7f43bc2fefaf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一切不符合第一性原理的需求，或者需要用户付出一定学习成本才能被满足的使用需求都会被 AI 时代所重塑。技术进步就是要打破或者降低一切学习门槛，无论是从生产端的应用开发还是用户端的使用学习成本。任何东西它的出现应该符合最直接的需求，而不是需要人类来特殊学习才能获得使用权。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c9144eb8-295d-4fe4-b713-943d92958767"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d256c7cd-6f41-4a4c-9bcd-50606f308c61"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月6日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9b5c4606-93f2-4d12-b4ac-c1e8e1e7f70e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"历史会永远反复。一切的委屈和不公，最后都会以诉诸暴力的方式去解决。时间永远不会抚平伤口，拳头硬才是真理。"},{"type":"hard_break"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a425c3f1-bae8-4c4c-8dee-fd00819623d1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月7日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cd19bb0b-b762-4813-8f40-9ad8f1eb5e4f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"舆论已经崩坏，人民已经不再相信。今夕是何年？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e8a75707-df80-4292-8082-9beaffaef804"},"content":[{"type":"hard_break"},{"type":"text","text":"12月8日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b2d9acd8-f715-4c7b-84b2-06f6f0a3a83e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这些年的感触就是不是一个阶层的人真的尿不到一壶去。这个阶层可以按照教育程度划分，也可以按照财富程度划分，更可以按照官员的权力大小划分，甚至你可以按照博主的粉丝量分。不同阶层的利益就是不一致的，没人会轻易的把拼命赚来的的权和利跟你一个平民百姓分。所以我们很难反驳他老人家的“以阶级斗争为纲”的口号是错误的，即便是他去世后的第49年。一个平等的社会是不可能有参差的，一个有参差的社会也是不可能会平等的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ef698be5-1ac6-4d5a-84f9-992054e3e31c"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"90d4287e-fd14-47ae-8e8e-88e852749e9f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月10肉"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"be04a81e-4130-4f28-947d-d9b600b8ce67"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"AI 生产内容的时代，真实已成为最稀缺资源。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f602a4ca-0d88-48fa-b321-b1d13a2dae75"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d9ea3043-6b82-4690-84c4-74be71ac943f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月11日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b08ebe5d-3462-4be8-bfaa-03ab2cd689ab"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在充满了阴谋论和断章取义的信息过载时代，人们越来越缺少了解“完整”的能力。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"072401e6-4f5d-4883-9270-7145b3d8b513"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8a307caf-c390-42b0-b8e3-ead5ed0721d7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月12日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2e1edb8a-4d87-4612-bc94-9b25f1c4aea6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"培养兴趣，养成习惯，而非设立目标。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c905ae3e-30f1-4086-b3c9-4824f1df603b"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7d9aa227-100e-4b70-a58b-ba9b8cdd401e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月13日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"62b42a73-573b-471a-abeb-7c570afd3a17"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这么多 AI 模型的名字，最喜欢谷歌的命名方式，最有活人感。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1750f77c-372a-4f94-85a5-b5f02cb9967d"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9acae487-e4bc-42f3-9ae1-85ec5ae139bd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月14日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4258ad37-8e5c-41b9-beda-250bf9cad7e7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不假思索的认同，不明真相的反对，都是思维懒惰的结果。一切事物都是有矛盾的，只是我们个人要选择哪一面。但前提是你做好了 AB test后做一个抉择，而不是一味的凭感觉做价值判断。"},{"type":"hard_break"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f243f95c-6520-40b4-a8a1-747a9197d2fc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月16日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8af40a93-7634-4b11-814d-4e4e8a5ca448"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Vibe Coding现在真的是太好用了，相比一年前刚推出的时候，如今基本上是指哪打哪……果然，自然语言才是最好的编程语言。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"266d105f-dd9c-44aa-8f97-e0a11c9c9fb7"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f840a9d7-b025-470f-8357-42fb1f3d1e71"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月17日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6f07bceb-edad-4737-9d91-d33a34ea8fba"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人创造解决问题的 SOP，AI 去制造 SOP 效率工具，工具去重复 SOP。真的价值在于解决需求，需求决定消费与否，收取必要的服务费用。这大概就是如今的复利杠杆所在。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bd1266ae-88fd-4c39-afec-fd8e39d6c85a"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"98791e94-0909-4d5b-95f7-94aaadae661e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月18日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0edb1784-6317-429e-8728-338ded5c60d4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"批判式创新通常不会成功。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"73f085ab-2b6d-491c-8c88-f4218bfdf913"}},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"65930cea-011b-4773-94ed-583509036561"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"12月19日"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a6ce625c-8f10-4cf8-be20-ed22115aee6f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"看到一个对「左派青年」最好的解释：一群充满理想又无法实现这些理想的青年。但又有什么比革命更浪漫的事儿呢？你如果问我革命成功了吗？我会回答，它成功过。"}]}]}
cards.title: 思考马克·三十四（2025年十一月记录）

cards.content: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"heading","attrs":{"id":"ab1e60b8-3461-4b93-880e-3d8e3e96a1d8","level":1},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019年思考记录节选"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"38fbe48f-c42d-4f98-9eb8-17db4f96600e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018/11/06"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f19333f1-5def-4e94-8a85-79f607be77ac"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"佛教有个概念“菩萨畏因，凡夫畏果”。菩萨会关心原因，而普通人只看结果，但是你如果只盯着结果，结果是改变不了的。你得想着去改变输入才有可能改变输出。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7180350f-ebcc-4ffe-ab29-8347103cae87"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018/11/07"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c4d2370c-faeb-479d-85fc-c914f2a45855"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"互联网上最通用的语言不是英语而是表情。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f39b8ae0-3477-4b06-97a6-958fb9b51280"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018/11/08"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5f84d51b-a0e2-4bde-b176-f2f912dbf9f5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"互联网的高度发达反而加大了人与人之间的信息鸿沟。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9784fe08-1987-4364-9916-e3e967ddb3c3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018/11/08"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"653820be-2b07-4b8e-8626-9d4b3bb07963"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"推动人类进步的竟然是「转发抽奖」。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"863c1484-b627-407e-b522-9eb12c50442e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018/11/13"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b03cd3a7-4668-44e6-82cb-23b7c51ddf81"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"打赏和捐款都是非理性消费。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9bacfd43-4319-42aa-9722-363b429185df"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018/11/16"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7e74ea70-e41e-4c26-94f8-d7d663b15b3b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"你强烈反对的，一定是你自己也拥有的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"77402d32-922a-4347-8e29-d4a28c3c026a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018/11/17"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0b505c96-ca2b-43d5-b302-48a9e1a20bc1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当下是唯一没有终点的东西。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e51d7355-b54d-435f-8536-3b969d3f4852"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018/11/18"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"83b0c370-0c19-4e45-8bf8-ac06797bc69f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"判断一个人是否富有，不是他买的东西，而是他买的起但觉得没必要的东西。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f9baf8a8-bf6a-46e0-bfb2-73b84d6556bd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018/11/20"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"80703b00-03af-4dcc-b7ec-7a0663f7eaf5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们不缺少社交平台，我们缺少一个写日记的地方。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d8d974e0-32d9-4f06-b36a-7df0c032563e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018/11/21"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e224bb7d-073c-42a1-bc4a-1a46645aa374"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我希望与这个世界有很多连接，但又不希望被过多打扰。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f9abb393-bcb3-4618-8624-63bb2dd3d2c7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018/11/22"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"316a8a2b-c098-42f1-b9a9-4f553fce0dee"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当一个人可以对自己的言论不负责任时才能看到很多真实情绪的外泄，而不像实名社交时围观的都是他人的苦难和炫耀。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"eb5b5f8e-7349-476c-ae1f-cb8d6ce1d295"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018/11/23"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3514e120-bd54-4f46-8d9c-d09fb8c7779e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最穷不是没有钱的时候，而是没有希望的时候。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"63d18064-8c15-4c6d-85d5-c9aef0dea799"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018/11/24"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"983ac62a-7304-4800-8330-5dc591e9ff60"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"用道德去衡量道德，这本身就是不道德的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6c7579a4-cf03-4a64-9181-57ca89bd6704"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018/11/28"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c500d5c3-d028-4cd9-9a45-9be61055947d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"杀死一个中产的方式有很多，杀死一个乞丐的方式并不多。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"561910f2-bec0-4623-8f9c-de7341198058"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018/11/29"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ecb563e0-d5e5-41a6-985d-37936559c488"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"能否变的“善良”取决于能否控制好内心的“魔鬼”。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"98388b7a-0b12-4de2-8784-4a80a794c02f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018/11/30"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e51d2371-7701-405f-a3e9-f5e722cf8f3c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"“我不是谁的粉丝，我是好东西的信徒”"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6829b392-9381-47da-a428-423c56c3eaa3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018/12/01"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"32419493-de24-4fbe-b989-527d2ce4f4f5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最大的谎言就是真实，最神秘的也往往是最肤浅的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"18c3a968-8a18-44d1-9345-4a674dbc8a02"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018/12/02"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4663da77-bab9-4766-9200-15b2996cbaf2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们做自媒体的说到底的谋生手段就是“做好内容，讲好故事”。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8a5eefae-dc92-4eaa-9381-88f713894075"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018/12/04"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fc174208-e5bb-4ec0-ac4a-48b175da7b18"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"鸡汤不能毫无修饰地存在，它必须依托于某种合适的场合出现，否则就得不到他人认可，所以说“鸡汤”是一种文化偏见。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e8d4d673-7966-48ad-952c-37e7f92bd742"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018/12/08"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"92a5ea5b-ab83-46e1-92e8-4bf552080038"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"所有的“改变”都是为了心中的“不变”。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a3cf7811-811f-4521-9433-d8fa0c57eff2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018/12/09"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c2bc7f86-5a09-4cf3-b5f6-5e69fcd09786"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在危险环境中表示绝望的人，在黑暗中看不见光明的人，只是懦夫与机会主义者。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2814958a-9fe0-45b7-8734-dcaacba7560a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018/12/10"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7f2bc1a0-f6f4-43e0-a846-e8903b1dddaa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这世间最公平的就是“时间”。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8e0d51ee-7600-4af7-8164-b6f67a075d86"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018/12/12"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"017dddf1-c4ee-413a-a1d5-a2093cbb8f61"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"技术早已经不是壁垒了，而人才是壁垒。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7605b5dd-c9bb-47e2-9bb1-8b65b6526e45"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018/12/13"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"61d5ce59-ebdb-4b89-957a-710ae9dcb581"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"永远是80%的人看见死亡，而20%的人看见希望。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"17e1ba40-24eb-4826-a2a9-3c0dd26dc825"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018/12/18"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cf678209-c800-4e5e-900e-3608789b7252"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"求学时总相信一句鸡汤“明天的你一定会感谢今天努力奋斗的你”，慢慢的发现这句话不对劲，现在越来越觉得对我们未来影响最大的往往不是具体工作，而是当下的眼界和选择。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a3c41de5-c563-474d-ba1e-f88b2ac271bd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018/12/23"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d35b12c1-fddb-48fa-ad64-4e8402b26997"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不是每个人都有资格说“善良比聪明更重要”，从某种意义上讲只有比别人“更聪明”才能打败对手。而“劝人善良”有时候更像是某种认输。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2455898b-3139-4dfb-8ded-bc45e54e11d4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018/12/25"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"40a1cace-4e4f-4726-b1b0-5eced6e25cd3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"可以说没看懂，不能说没看见。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8c52a1e8-14d2-42ce-90fc-f08cc6e5fdc8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018/12/30"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1aed4fc3-5cbf-4d64-b4e7-8de773003e90"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"总是在说过很多话后，才能明白沉默是金。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"12c0b43f-e08f-4e54-a60b-9dc0e1498e9d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2018/12/31"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a196735a-b0b4-431a-8821-421e9a20f8ac"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"真正感动人的，从来都不是什么思想，而是年轻的勇气。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ed317390-bddd-42b3-abe8-7f56da2a7633"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/02"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c1247bab-6df9-4613-a8aa-0cf7e7018f28"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"虽然，现在已经是太空时代了，人类可以搭乘太空船到达月球。但却没办法看穿每个人心里的宇宙。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cb8f3e98-ce9f-4be7-8681-3b07f8ffd224"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人，果然还是这个世界上最复杂的生物。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"307ff0d4-0fc4-45b0-ab4b-958c9b4784c8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/03"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ec9df3b3-b203-41b8-8e89-83fab881b895"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"为什么会有很多人为了“好看”而去穿“不合脚”的鞋子？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f028e72c-2430-4316-a687-57aabd071b78"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/04"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"727a3fef-a2f5-4181-9eb7-3f2df0ef7b25"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一个人能赚多少钱基本公式如下：买单的人数"},{"type":"text","marks":[{"type":"em"}],"text":"频率"},{"type":"text","text":"单价—成本。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3bc89aba-f46e-4bf7-8046-2d1e0e0ca30f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/05"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ee24fd5e-19ec-477e-a5c8-53eeb863b189"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"表白是最最错误的恋爱方式，恋爱关系是一种事实关系，而不是一种承诺关系。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9d2b1f27-2124-499d-8d66-5ab5b856cd0c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/05"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"424ce95d-31a7-445c-a02c-a8285cfee8f9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"每天恨不得把他赚钱的方法告诉你的人，一定要警惕！长者云“闷声大发财才是最好的”，真正的富人一般是超级低调。不怕贼来偷，就怕贼惦记。而那些喝了三两酒就拍桌子说着”老子也想低调，可实力不允许啊！”，那都是二百五，得离远点。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d4b37cf1-51c4-4312-a43d-6019b9ed6959"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/06"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d78db7b1-ded9-439f-91b9-1cc9b7db1a30"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"差异是人类的宝贵财富。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fb0ac835-ca7e-4ed6-b8a0-ab1919268888"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/06"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9360cbec-cdb3-4741-808b-f01f8662a104"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人不怕被反对，怕被忽视。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1c76f233-9c36-4eb8-a703-6ce18d227c8b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/06"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"87b27557-b40a-401a-9b7e-5516d057e443"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"小孩子才最在意假期长短，大人只看是不是双倍工资。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d4d580f2-bb18-4aac-b86e-0fac0d247fcb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/07"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"aad9b495-1411-4672-96f7-0d4bdb15545e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"真实才是世界上最美的东西。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1ea35db3-7c7a-42d0-9def-3c8108c38a55"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/08"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fd029675-435f-4315-a1f0-8deaae317c9e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人的套路是有限的，主要看是不是你的菜。而机器的套路是活的，可以慢慢进化成你的菜。最终变成为你量身定做的毒品。剥夺了你思考的权利，一直给你快感，让你变成记忆只有7秒的互联网金鱼。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7a8d7a53-084e-42c2-b1a0-7bb35de0f9cc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/08"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cb1b622e-6795-4baa-8591-01dd9dc9d4bd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最美好的ending是“戛然而止”。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"581e4e1e-b56a-4e3f-8e56-e6a388d482b3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/08"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"94775dd1-4ee8-4d5e-aa7a-6c71f476cd20"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"社会常常在讲要公平正义，但在他们的生活之中，应该是没有这四个字，毕竟光是要捧饭碗就没力了，哪还有力气去讲那些有的没的。——大佛普拉斯"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"98ed68cb-adc8-4ab6-a4d1-ad6eaee3ccd8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/09"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2fc01063-46a9-4312-8662-aebc179612bc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"先要有独立的财产，才能有独立的人格。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"83ff5b85-e604-465f-a70a-880fb9859304"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/11"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7e288c07-567b-4107-8493-8055149ba22b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"贪嗔痴是人性最大的恶。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"44683c38-e95d-4769-a324-b6a9a3b4279c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/12"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7ee6efdd-f4d7-4d34-b8e3-b2ddeca6cc72"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一群自私的基因在教导他人如何奉献，这真是可笑至极。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4859e4b2-0742-4d04-9723-5231a112e858"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/13"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"538607e9-1f68-43f6-bfc7-d3bc94c7cecf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有时候人不会明白自己真正想要的是什么，一旦被深深伤害了，就开始自暴自弃。殊不知其实能令自己真正悲伤的，正是自己心灵深处的东西，因为珍贵，所以永远都不能放弃，永远都不应该转身离开。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cd3af717-369f-47aa-8887-69bf80b6bb14"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/13"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"908066f2-0d06-476e-8748-e92887e73626"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"科学的尽头是玄学，不只是质量守恒，世界上的所有东西都遵循守恒。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b4843386-0b3e-4986-9780-969983e62329"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/13"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d4d6f6ca-4434-47ba-b388-17118763fc11"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"社会是分层的，所以好的社交产品也是分层的。熟人关系既能让每个人与他人连接，也能让一群人成为孤岛。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c55444e2-3f86-4b36-beb3-46fe7b62251e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/14"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"859d07dd-7f4b-409e-94e7-87cda8de7237"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"真正的不幸和艰苦从来都是“不可告人”的，反而是那些被佯装的“不幸”被大肆宣扬着。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8261dc15-57dc-4ea8-8001-a6a70745aaa2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"用“善良”欺骗善良。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f216ed06-937b-4f5c-b673-1c1fee40b90f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/14"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2b1538c6-53db-4123-92ae-2e273d9172e9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有两类人要警惕：一种是到处告诉别人他怎么赚钱的，另一种是大肆宣扬他有多不幸的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f0726e22-e9f1-44dd-a083-c02af4b8043c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/15"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a9db7f9d-d41a-435c-bd06-b1b6e3333dd0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"替代微信，并不是用户的需求。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ab1ffede-4477-4aad-b44f-a65faeb9b08d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/16"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"038dc77e-ba94-4272-9c44-2897a28be3af"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最智能的AI是“人工”，有多少智能，就有多少人工。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"19e04f67-ef10-4d17-8138-bff86150a7d9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/16"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fa2d308a-656a-4c80-abd6-8a9bc4818a4a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人类科技的发展史是一部用机器替代人工的发展史，未来人的价值不再是用重复的劳动带来价值，而是用思考创造出不同的可能。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cd030282-6d14-4434-b20d-4b6027dfe154"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/18"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"db45ada6-f041-43a1-a61a-1cbb0006a59f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"美好的东西多半是简单的，好的产品也是如此。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a8441191-cec6-42eb-bf11-50e391ede9df"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/19"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7f9ed2cc-f8a6-4d53-a822-4e1eba268c11"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"社交是人与人之间的游戏。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"29f34162-d1bf-45ac-959e-d7f5fac3c39f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/20"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"156f06ad-d7a6-44a6-af01-c3261c613b2d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"凡事还是要自己体会，意见可以听但千万别盲从，因为大多数人都是用的“二手知识和经验”，根本没做过的建议能叫建议嘛？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8d200f4f-fd3c-4503-8f82-49230bb70245"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/27"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bebd6fe6-9ed6-4d04-930a-7590330b4f69"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"教育的目的就是把人教育成“人”，让人有勇气去自己思考。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f4a03a06-6b82-4ba7-af82-f9fe2e71b3dd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/27"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7d3c3dcf-a323-465e-8ec4-d49f189cb4d3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人在睡着时是最美的，它是没有目的的快乐。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5577297c-aba4-4f33-aa94-b521b106357f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/27"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1281fe21-ead8-4fdb-95fb-ee7165c581a1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一切为了流行的东西都是不真实的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a91ac85b-c9a4-4871-b91b-386ee962f5f0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/29"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fc5e8525-cf23-4b5b-a84a-e095da768f50"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"成熟并不可怕，可怕的是在四平八稳中体会激情的灰飞烟灭。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b74abcae-3354-44cc-9e9c-19520719101f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/29"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"38271fda-33a4-4f70-8e2d-226ea62f7ecc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"实名都在炫耀，匿名都在骂人。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"843efabd-3666-4544-9649-8ddd5d5b155d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/30"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"97360bd1-0528-4931-a6e6-31c2607a087f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人生的乐趣之一就是：不断的和别人成为朋友，也莫名奇妙的和朋友成为路人。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"400edda1-b735-4c85-95d4-6aed096687d5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"迷失的人迷失了，相逢的人会再相逢。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"36987688-dec5-4d42-9652-6fd3d73d8e2f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/30"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3c9a9bf4-d7e1-4098-a45f-5ca00a8ebc01"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"“朋友”和“老师”这个词在当今使用的太普遍了以至于更像是一种“敬词”。正因如此，我倍加珍惜身边每一位能真正称得上的“良师益友”。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a6412989-c0e5-4b4e-9645-86d000d1d1fd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/01/30"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7401b231-9a42-45f4-8e38-8217cb8661ce"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以为自己能理解他人，才是真正的傲慢。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"99e4b8f0-c0f0-45fc-8010-1aecd9cb9a01"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/02/05"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"52d41142-1810-46b1-9f8d-b9f8b7fba15a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"过去总以为睡觉舒服，今天才明白说话比睡觉更舒服。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"eaac8cbf-4aa7-4361-845b-26788c73edfb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/02/05"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6844a9fe-8356-4603-a00d-234a3613166c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"过年是一群人的行为艺术。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"53e0c31a-7c1b-4e6c-a326-4bc405b3beab"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/02/06"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c2de06ed-ff62-4aca-804c-cb3645c1fca7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们始终是希望自己是舞台的中心，一群附加的东西都是陪衬。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"911d7915-21b6-4e1d-8225-fcff3c917cf5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"C’est La Vie."}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"63c6e43e-e91d-4835-9f72-8d59c373b15c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/02/06"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d93c769f-2872-471a-99a8-925b11a05c61"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"独善其身是一种睿智的生活方式，减少外界的干扰，更加专注的做一些事情。因为人的注意力是有限的，是最宝贵的资源。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e34b04d7-76ba-4168-8c23-26b34f524967"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/02/08"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e5ef8276-0de8-4f51-8761-bc135c1c1fd7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"大城市里的产品经理们始终不会明白，快手几块钱的春节红包便是很多家庭整个春节的快乐源泉。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"decb6393-e18d-481e-a321-a1bee4e66c60"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/02/11"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fd2b5d20-6440-477d-827e-f4afa31a80c6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"你要相信这个世界真有“魔鬼”，不然没法了解人性。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"01af722a-7a9f-41c0-bc3a-8fe1012cbb06"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/02/24"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8253acb7-f428-4a57-ba3b-145c2640fd09"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以前觉得有钱了就有尊严了，后来发现大错特错，挣钱这事儿不仅挣不来尊严，而且还要丢掉一些尊严"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"55767b2f-4991-42cc-80f1-957e17f141b0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/03/02"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7f3eb5f1-6ded-43d3-b0e3-8b6d2d4a350c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当我们看宇宙时，我们是在看它的过去。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4b27dfa6-c9d2-42ea-89d1-dcb1340acc86"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/03/05"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"295ceb2f-ebbf-442f-b583-de241537acd6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们总是在想要成为谁，但就是不当不了自己，而事实是你只能当自己，你没办法成为任何人。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c99022bd-5101-4134-98b5-1f4c22608c32"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/03/08"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7f339830-2768-4e39-b22b-05dcced62308"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人的成就来自于两样东西，创造和毁灭。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e4ddfe89-f73a-4e70-8530-7a1260d40266"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/03/13"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"baa9bbf6-c87b-4dab-b183-2c7c9b2ccb54"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"长大了后才明白“尊严”这种东西不仅帮助不了自身，反而容易形成累赘。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"48e914ca-fc24-4465-ab25-1072716a0fad"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/03/13"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cebc1421-6a2c-4ed3-92ed-d67090387024"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如果你智商够用，通过考试读书还真是一个最优惠且稳妥的来提升自己人脉圈子水平的方式。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"75390e39-d69e-44e2-8ce9-0047345331bb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/03/15"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8018d17d-b530-43f1-a5df-3875b61ed24d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"小的时候不懂事会疑问为什么这个世界会是这个样子，长大了，慢慢觉得世界就应该这个样子。但怎么也高兴不起来了。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c296868b-e85d-43e7-874a-1f3c721f529b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/03/16"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"de7db359-31f3-49f7-9b36-63b77cf6d4a7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"那些所谓的成功人士总是过多吹嘘标榜实力，而很少提及自己的运气。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"17364dd0-fd06-4e20-af8b-395a62f371d5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/03/18"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e77bcac6-6952-4df4-81e9-7c64c55f8d0d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一定要警惕那些说我可以带着你赚钱的人，因为你一定会为此付出更昂贵的代价。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e6e8c9a9-e620-4d48-bc60-fec89e5cae3e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/03/18"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1506937d-6f51-4d78-a7e3-1855886bb2a3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们经常会陷入一个错觉，以为努力了就会有收获。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6d6593dc-b451-4fc1-ae33-f589eea9aefe"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/03/24"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"97efe93b-ec58-4850-9b06-046f013f3636"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"太多人在乎功利，而不愿意静下心来做一些无涉利益而真正有意义的事。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e6954304-0bc1-47f4-a5c8-085f9a99cca4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"然而，精神病人能，这不能不说是讽刺。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"efeb815d-64ec-4c41-84de-9aac085343db"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/04/09"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a8716894-1719-406b-8734-71df38f86a96"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我发现不能跟用户说的太清楚，太清楚了就没有神秘感了，就很难自己达到探索的高潮了。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c956634e-d75f-4e74-97aa-b08febc5b40b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这跟xx内衣是必需品是一个道理。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cf669497-c76b-44cb-ae82-83d856d4426e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/04/09"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c1237b90-3e68-4cd8-98b2-89246fb3a383"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"短视频火了之后，其他ugc社区都不好做了，因为用户的兴奋阈值被拉的太高了。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9e5958f0-f604-4e79-8169-2e6ea3809ce2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当然，除了实用信息以外。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4e0139ec-9e94-4436-b910-0d17784ea60b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/04/09"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6f513054-6eb8-47b8-a189-73d8b7c362e0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以前用户总会说一些敏感信息，现在好了，用户说都不说了。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8bf6a6b5-74f8-4f4e-a3e7-95981639132c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"互联网越来越不真实了，大家的演技越来越好了。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"548954f2-c0c5-4b5e-b2ce-97da8192fa8b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/04/10"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8f3679e5-71ca-464d-9ab4-48e7ec2b96e4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"因为人有惰性，人会有一些奇奇怪怪的思维，所以人应该做一些富有创造力的工作，而那些重复繁重的工作应该被机器取代，因为机器不会累，不会抱怨，很好控制且功率稳定。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f4c484c0-385b-4255-84f1-754cdc42e187"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/04/11"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f1382d73-8085-4377-8039-37571c611f83"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"钉钉就是资本家们限制奴隶的手铐和脚镣。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b8eece75-e74a-43ec-96de-ee2cb4af7d76"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/04/23"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e6252b0f-15ee-4612-960b-ed0891360a6e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"大多数自媒体都在推粪上山，消耗着公众那少的可怜的注意力。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3cccdc7a-ae0a-4de2-8e12-f8cb715f6ea4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/04/30"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"16d70c5d-eca0-48f1-8fb5-30075f679502"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"成年人的世界里有种怪病，什么都想要的病。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8a2e9df6-127b-42e0-ae45-e87d4c3e010f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/5/28"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d7170a5c-9256-4dda-860e-8bdf7cb65926"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"任何完美都是一个等待拆穿的骗局。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7b3f3021-6fc7-49c9-af5d-cb4168ed7456"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/5/29"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"92519992-b669-4fe9-a75c-27a43609834b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人們只有長大後自己的利益真的受到損害才會明白自己年輕時扮演的角色，所獲得的虛偽認同感是多麼可笑和不值一提。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"131f79b4-5a62-48da-b26f-f9276c58983b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/05/31"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ea61b927-10ed-4731-8dc8-c4e4e22e3f69"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"很多事不体验根本没有话语权。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ec8ed1b7-755b-49d2-bf12-d071ab7396bf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/06/10"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"660485a6-835a-43f1-a11d-1db370c7edc3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"没有人真正在乎过对错，只会关心真相是否对自己有益。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e7c534e7-3eed-4bf4-bf37-8b3d34460582"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/06/10"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8a609f55-e15e-4e4f-af5d-b48f5e6ad8f4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"听话，是平庸的开始。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e280f4f0-0779-4799-8998-d992346bf779"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/06/12"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b3b310ba-774f-4c04-bdbc-7dab2f8fa291"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"重複的事還是讓機器去做吧，否則那少的可憐的熱情就又會縮減了。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9cddcd1b-83de-473e-b3ee-ec86235f418b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/06/12"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7a0d162f-af29-4103-a4ce-414e4fe51596"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"以前大家通過電視認識世界，所以那個時候各個電視台的人看起來很酷。現在大家通過Youtube和B站看視頻，所以會覺得UP主很酷。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d58b4d72-ead2-4d45-a228-32a2d337fe0b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"仔細想想科技進步這麼多年，視頻依然是大多數人認知世界的方式。未來呢？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"751832ec-865b-4325-89aa-2fe8a9a36ca5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/06/13"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c1793883-00ab-4428-97e1-c87bed783543"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不要嘲讽那些比自己勇敢的人，更不要为自己的苟且而得意，我们可以卑微如尘土，但不可以扭曲如蛆虫。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"af31006f-9666-4059-865a-78c3b71cb1d5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/06/14"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c2641f2d-9cff-441a-9919-972c095e5965"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"从来没有如此悲观过，我悔恨当初怎么能对一个行业那么的乐观，也觉得现在过分的悲观。不过我还是需要继续学习我感兴趣的，我明明知道自己想要什么了，可是还是不肯去改变那一定是我自己的问题。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"97adf919-f72e-450a-a9f8-c70669d0c690"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/06/17"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f8c4f6bf-1b60-43b8-a7ef-5360b9bf9a95"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当一个人再也不需要找存在感时，就会发现原来别人认同与否是多么的不值得一提。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"229618ba-07f1-4e1a-9e8a-4397c461e609"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/06/18"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e3a735cf-b0bb-47ef-a28c-083b5f4ff4cd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"福楼拜说：“人的一生中，最光辉的一天并非是功成名就那天，而是从悲叹与绝望中产生对人生的挑战，以勇敢迈向意志那天。”"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dd783968-db94-4e9b-a80b-2b9c3c93f7bf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"生活永远充满希望，因为希望不属于现在，而属于未来…"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"39b09f35-bf6b-4b21-bc47-97060005766a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/06/19"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3164fe41-1473-41a7-8abd-069ac9674974"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当世界上所有人都在奔跑时，我却要告诫自己缓慢行走。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9cd7cbee-21e3-4925-931f-ecd1f6ef8e96"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/06/21"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b394e1ef-0cc9-4cea-8432-2c0ad09bd75d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"原来每一个人的心中都有一个崇高道德标准，即便是我们认为的坏人也是如此。换句话说，坏也是相对的，没有人能一直做违背自己内心的事情。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"827c4c31-d582-4a9d-8380-d2dc76cdf0db"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/06/22"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a28c90ec-92a3-405e-8d91-c46382cf8bcf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"最好的投资原来是投资自己，这不确定的回报率会让我们终身受益。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ce7542a0-2e4a-46de-9fce-987f715b4adf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/06/22"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e9966c7e-3392-4cce-bf53-bb26fc9a25e9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"呆久了，会厌烦；"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"87426b19-1ad6-4002-8bbc-9d181a355046"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"离开了，又不舍。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7cb47334-8e54-41fc-acfb-2fea8c118ef9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"果然是万有引力。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c45f19ea-c1ec-4a8d-b5b8-9181d5e2ec2a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/06/23"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"73f5f9f4-c6b1-4881-9a91-7100979f2c42"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"成长的标志之一就是要学会主动删除微信好友。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3dd31fc9-7c89-4fb6-aa83-f67007bd5892"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/06/23"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c4151709-0d5e-4280-8708-009176943ff7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"没有好友的人不伤心。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"051541a5-ded0-41e2-a842-2a54eaafb6b6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/06/24"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7d8ce75a-fdb4-4ed0-a69a-89e9378d4e37"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们都有欲望，"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0b75ea7e-2c69-4489-b60d-a0f94368fe07"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们都会傲慢，"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"38cfb772-2865-42b6-be17-6bd8e9e9e86b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们也有各种各样的偏见。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"baf0c6c6-99bf-45ba-94bb-3ab174dba97d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们需要有信仰，"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2f6d487f-41b3-4cab-b3de-2f16335f07c8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们需要忏悔，"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9e5c779d-8f86-4e4b-aa2c-c5cf99e4827e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们需要敬畏，"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"eb61c7ce-7939-4de1-9630-c5d35d52866f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们需要感恩。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6405d20b-ccbd-4a68-a2a6-4b71b2e43f46"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/06/27"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d037d7be-0aa5-4293-bbee-9dbf5e7535b0"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"良性运行的社会应该更多的用“规则”去约束个体的行为，而不能用道德的核武器去抨击。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cc8191e1-597f-4a76-b146-295c7e98dd2f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"道德就像“内裤”，不能逢人便说我穿了，也不能逢人便说你没穿。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"51b94c18-d2eb-4769-9268-1f3d5295abcb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/06/28"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2a87ab47-3d1a-4a6d-a30c-ab4ed8f8ed2d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我有一个大脑，但是脑子里却有三个我。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"96fdb676-bf6a-4eb1-84d3-51efabdca476"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/06/29"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"038974b9-418c-4065-9b73-fe55685acbfc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"研究表明我们会在48h内忘记约75%的学习内容。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2844c00c-dd54-44aa-b73e-fd7ecf2d9d86"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/06/30"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"14dffc60-db6e-44fd-bdce-66921ae7eee9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人生最后悔的事就是“我本可以”。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e02d8162-c2e6-4601-a9d6-201df5b724b9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/07/01"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ed05e2ea-fce0-4853-a413-ea6d810a4829"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我以为别人尊重我，是因为我很优秀，现在才明白，别人尊重我，是因为别人很优秀。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e468e193-1e71-48e0-9ac0-f683d2ae891b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/07/05"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b06eb501-81c6-4537-939b-7a6cb598b8ac"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"经济基础决定了上层“价值观”。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"de4da4c7-a512-44c0-a670-bbdfce86889b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/07/06"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4414819f-5452-4421-bcc6-00771dd5bddc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人是社会关系的总和，社会是生产关系的总和。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a0c431e1-6814-4103-8dfa-f926d350484b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/07/06"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c66dcd44-3a44-4031-ba6b-93f6aea94ac5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们一辈子都在争取自己想扮演的社会角色。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8e1b8219-1a89-44bf-92a7-a3db8083ae22"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/07/10"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cd273645-2148-46e4-b23d-cd643d56855b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"难点不在于讲故事，而在于要让人相信。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b4d8e5b0-3e8b-462f-9a98-a8264df323aa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/07/10"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"65db54ed-9b00-455f-abbd-76c2b059f5ef"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我想控制的东西，都在控制我。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"17e743e7-bba6-4198-9940-0872d580b62b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/07/11"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"37700b4f-0a25-4521-b1c3-1d6ba3c3d648"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"从我有认知的那天起，我就有了偏见。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3faf52d8-8343-467f-9cae-76e124b50a25"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/07/11"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3addb40d-50e4-4f45-95d4-447f2f6cea82"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"现实社会中，人们都比较“自我”，网络社会中，人们更“本我”，朋友圈除外，它简直是“超我”。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"eed320e7-e82a-44f5-b61f-cea2b35a65e2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/07/11"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"486db566-5080-48fd-84fe-ebb441e60e61"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"观察一个人不应该简单看他住什么房子，开什么车子，穿什么衣服。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4f9e65e0-4a32-4d67-ae1e-5771d4c548e2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"重点要看他搜索引擎都搜了什么，还有他垃圾桶里都装了什么。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5ea8713e-f85b-4dbb-8a11-082db6dbb654"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/07/12"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cdbb8fd1-2479-47b0-b8bf-82c87519eb8b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"怀念小时候，那时买一本想看的书都不容易，一本书能够安静认真的读完甚至可以说是一气呵成，现在我们随处可以获取想看的，但是我的生活也变的支离破碎了，每天看似忙忙叨叨的，也许只有内心清楚每天都收获了什么。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4dbce8c2-a33c-47c2-ad20-97101441ff8b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/07/12"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8e4e933f-4847-4ada-a0b5-335f1bd45a68"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们在社会中扮演了各种各样的角色，所以既然是演，这就有意无意的让一些演技差的人显得很虚伪，所以真实在如今才显的尤为可贵。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"32903e3d-0ad1-4c1e-8dfb-970afc89082a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"有时候也觉得虚伪是件好事，它是情商高的体现，但仔细想想真的“情商高”应该是既让人觉得真实又让人舒服才好。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"57d83bf1-e4c2-4de1-9bd1-9ccf3b617208"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/07/13"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7c44fdb7-7cd2-49aa-85a0-08728295bb27"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"个体自由的前提是自律，群体自由的前提是包容。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"68af98df-5e27-4145-b2a1-212fd6e400da"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/07/14"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e553e71b-4f6c-4455-9de6-b9a3e31d53a2"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当资源有限的时候，千万别奢求人们讲文明。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8640f0ee-7c14-4410-a8aa-a327d46e6c5d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/07/16"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bf8af250-15fa-4458-8a11-7821c5d24e16"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人和动物的区别是人有主观能动性。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2dde89a7-3a29-4c2a-a533-29489bda76ee"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/07/19"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"71ff4665-370e-449c-9315-4ff12cfb0129"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"凡是道德提倡的，都是反人性的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d614728b-2e46-4f74-86fe-f3c9a8ef9b18"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/07/19"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"26a55a7d-5ce6-4619-a19a-c82e59da66d1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一切历史都是“当代史”。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4ec2cce1-f241-4b75-b1a8-c5176d2819c4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/07/20"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2c245115-1dc6-4001-9d72-535fa1612222"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"枯燥乏味的事情要交给机器做，人还是做创造性的工作比较好。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"78bbea9a-9f61-452a-89f7-f2f6c16f93cd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"因为人性情不稳定，机器虽有bug但和人相比太好修理了……"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7a7510bf-de29-407d-828c-4d0d87f8b96c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/07/21"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2f8160d5-0e39-4337-8852-2af546aa1096"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"那些我们最后真正想要的都不是我们的初衷。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"423a7098-9eda-4653-b041-651a03fe7d18"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/07/25"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9507b904-1ebf-4fb1-99dd-76d19c660757"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这些墙很有趣。刚入狱的时候，你痛恨周围的高墙；慢慢地，你习惯了生活在其中；最终你会发现自己不得不依靠它而生存。这就叫体制化。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"71a120c0-5d6e-41fc-908a-9a182899bf18"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"——《肖申克的救赎》"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d6f14a42-b87e-4ea0-b008-a38aa54fd15d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/07/27"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"833cf863-59b9-4840-89b7-c80ec1568e1a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当代社会的虚假之一是每天人们都生活在社交网络的各种表演和被赞的死循环里。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5b3c12bc-d442-4d58-ae90-0f30e078d3bb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/07/28"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"97b020dc-7bff-4604-83ae-246e6079556f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"19世纪出了那么多思想家，然而在信息如此发达的21世纪，我们却在用人类最先进的科技“娱乐至死“，我们是否正在陷入我们给自己挖的陷阱？下一次人类思想解放会在什么时候呢？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c0aca1bd-75b3-4810-89a2-961123056076"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/07/29"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c58c2fa6-67de-42b9-93a7-2ceddae48cee"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"听听不同的声音，尊重每一个人的言论，如果你能够理解对方说什么，说明你有类似的经验；如果还不能接受，说明你的生活经历与他不同，也不要大惊小怪或者下结论，以后生活的路还很长。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d8262fd1-4b2b-4c00-89ee-0a1f76100d38"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/08/01"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"97cf4d0e-1c14-4216-a252-d01cd300df4b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"慢慢人们会发现，不上网就是快乐源泉。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f8cd7847-00f0-42e3-97d0-76bfb2442604"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/08/03"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8aadab4a-1e2b-479d-8c1f-e452cfe664f9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在获取信息如此便捷的今天，社交网络上的人与人之间对话，经常会出现一个人把另一个人当作“搜索引擎”来用的尴尬境地。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cc98a99e-9dd1-4f6b-b8cb-d65a1a036769"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/08/03"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5e6ef4ca-c67e-4f92-9b9e-155f793c7137"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"For we pay a price for everything we get or take in this world, and, although ambitions are well worth having, they are not to be cheaply won."}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a1596d58-4064-4772-ae0a-eca4fc009f88"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/08/04"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c375839c-62fb-420b-8302-92d224540c5b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一个成功积极的学习者，应对任何观点都保持开放性，并愿意改变自己过去的偏见。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d531f323-77c4-45f0-bebf-f8e16bcca7dd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/08/04"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a62496ea-368a-4d4a-931b-e540b4223a00"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"马克思说人的本质是一切社会关系的总和，从社会属性上看人的不同是人的圈子的不同。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8aef107f-d199-4a11-81bf-0c3bf02622ad"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/08/04"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bb3ebfc0-3a33-4a34-aa2e-e49bf69a9e46"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"学习的努力程度和掉头发和头皮的程度成正比。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7c6f25ad-6960-426a-9a62-a17880151ef3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/08/05"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"014b7c69-5ea6-4ae7-8854-bbee95615890"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"“劣币驱逐良币”不仅仅是一个经济学现象，更是一个社会学现象。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4003d4dc-42c1-4c95-8e36-11b902dc10f9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/08/06"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9b325d56-f3ff-4dd0-a75a-b9e7714323d1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"There is only one heroism in the world: to see the world as it is and to love it."}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"80376a4e-7f48-4b64-9d00-a9eb9803fbf4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/08/07"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"93217aad-c7e1-44dc-a428-281ec4332fba"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"对公共事务的关心程度在某种程度上反映了一个社会的发展水平。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8f77af85-1cc4-4db0-b7e5-6a0525fc0b51"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/08/08"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a6b0ba85-1980-413b-8cf2-64878db7a699"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"只有不断引起疼痛的东西，才不会忘记。仇恨是本能，是维持记忆力最强有力的手段。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7d8d6d04-39f9-4894-8580-42a0c2bc5dac"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/08/08"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4399f822-0d51-4f46-8c98-4d095c6e0351"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"坚信比谎言更是真理的敌人。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"931dc54f-64ee-4d7b-a871-ce2908e85e4c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/08/08"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"dd003b66-c432-4f40-993c-5ed538f3e564"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人最终喜爱的是自己的欲望，不是自己想要的东西。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"242ab0db-392a-4092-bf42-3539240f7659"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/08/09"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"29b542bc-d019-494f-8549-0803384a3736"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"摧毀一個人的靈魂比摧毀肉體更具有殺傷力，正所謂「殺人誅心」。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ac3b0bb7-15b3-4862-8ce4-d2dbe0f0e050"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/08/12"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"cd862f40-6b67-4051-b07f-2e94208a0840"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"“職業不分高低貴賤”是一個政治正確的說辭，在社會學上職業的聲望是有明顯細緻的劃分的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"047a4cdc-a780-4dd4-ae3f-001c92583862"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/08/13"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9b5cbc05-4f7a-42cc-960e-79745e0aca77"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"從小到大有太多人告訴我要怎樣，"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7b11a0d6-543d-4383-a080-f465eaee855d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"卻很少人告訴怎麼去勇敢做自己。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b72d2cd5-49db-46ee-8023-e27c2df45d40"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/08/13"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"83ccad5c-77b3-4d48-b9c8-d25a8c810b58"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一味地迎合觀眾，叫做商品，全然的表達自我，才能稱作藝術品。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"29f2bee6-157b-435d-9ac3-5e45e963f23f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/08/14"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"aab36ac2-99ae-4b78-a36e-95c1621fd642"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"假努力比真懶惰還要可怕。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bfdce7ef-17e1-49c1-9822-6689a4af0939"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/08/14"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8d877eeb-2e17-425f-ba51-ad8e9f73c8e7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"沒什麼比當眾譴責作惡的人更容易，也沒什麼比理解他更難。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"82b2a8af-9164-414a-bb89-2b74212033f4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/08/14"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1a17a3bb-b593-4285-9005-f49c5f8f3d90"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"判斷可能片面、浅薄和武断，但背后是我对他人与时代真诚的理解。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0c4a5ff6-0744-459f-bb69-08d9cdc72620"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/08/18"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e0082ce9-963e-41ef-8c38-5bcb2972757f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"決定世界命運的是世人所愛與堅信不移的故事。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"49f55ebb-ccdf-4bff-a484-1b2f14daca94"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/08/27"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ad495cc3-6cfc-4dc9-b624-6add94bf563e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"随着生产力发展，有了私有财产后，男人为了把自己的私有财产延续下去，人类才从母系社会走向了男权社会。人类不平等的起源——私有制，但也是它推动社会进步，但社会越进步人就越不平等，这是人类的困境。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2b2e4eda-4300-4c5c-b9ab-86aa4e7f200d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/08/28"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2a690802-e0b5-41dd-a1e1-2b2272cb94db"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"后来我才明白，动机来自于开始，而目的往往是最后……"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a6b25621-1336-4c53-b367-117a1dbb23d6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/08/28"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"24fae57a-b471-4af4-968b-c1a87aebae62"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"集体主义必然导致个人崇拜。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"24807adc-9df5-4d30-985e-a4fc255440e6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/08/29"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"19c489af-f781-4a36-9190-dc0ecdc2bfaa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"现代人的大部分痛苦和焦虑都是源自于过度社交。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"57e5901a-5743-470d-a423-43268cfbbc7e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/08/29"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b9755e9c-3b99-4a70-851b-08dcb4a7683d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人之间的大部分矛盾源自不遵守“社会契约”造成的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3e682949-a16e-47b9-88fb-bda044841713"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/08/29"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e815a5ef-79ff-4d35-b996-ebbaf7bcffdc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"山东人相比其他省份学习英语更有优势，因为英语和山东话一样擅长用倒装……"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fbdc628d-168e-4f08-b225-f66f86bf461a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/08/29"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c9cf4a48-1c47-44dd-a9bb-59f4e9f2503f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"生活就是这么现实，比你好看的人比你更努力，比你聪明的人比你还有趣。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ecced724-64dd-4724-b957-cc4477d780c4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"留给我们这种又丑又笨的只能是无限的自卑……"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3500eeb3-95cc-46fc-8aed-9498905b837d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/08/30"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"29235db0-a199-475e-8199-451fd6b43de9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"大家总是不明白一个道理，话不是说出来就会有用的，也要看听的人愿不愿意听。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fe80ca9e-db41-4958-a7d1-fcfabf2e529c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/09/01"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4f18dec2-ae66-41cc-8e3c-6e6a72ce0b7b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"读书会让人收获“快乐”，但这种感觉是延迟一段时间才能给予的不是立竿见影的。这个延迟满足过程和大脑分泌多巴胺的机制截然相反，如果人人都能理解这个过程，我相信很多人会热爱它。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"893fc3a4-a234-44a9-bb6d-7cf6d5961ba9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"几十秒短视频持续的刺激是让人上瘾的毒品，它让人逐渐的麻木，即使算法会给我们持续投喂更符合我们口味的东西，但迟早有一天它会失效，毕竟它算不出我们的贪婪。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3de9ab49-a9f4-40ec-8de7-fc63629e36d7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/09/01"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fbb58364-2345-47c8-b9d7-5df2ebd6bb1e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"建国初期人们看不起商人认为赚钱可耻，现在市场经济下鼓励创业，年轻人又对创业成功者进行崇拜。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5747048b-7330-4c0d-8ee6-f8cb0cb19462"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"话说赚钱讨生活不是人类本能嘛，干嘛把赚钱的商人或资本家说的那么伟大。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"00eb5420-8e9f-424d-81df-713126140e06"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/09/02"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2d503318-371e-42c3-a37c-075ef00d047a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"实证主义在反对形而上学的独断时，自己也犯了同样的错误——将自然科学的研究方法绝对化了。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b6aff1e1-9b3a-4592-b822-ea369c9999bb"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/09/02"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"215b760d-faf6-42b6-912c-b9b994384761"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人们利用普遍的东西‌，但人们不喜欢它‌，人们只喜欢个别的东西。正因我们‌对特殊和个别之物‌的一次性过程感兴‌趣，所以历史学的‌任务就是要表述个‌别的东西。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9237d167-5c11-41f3-9b7c-647b78f1201a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/09/04"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"12c421af-9891-4d46-a540-c39c1bff8bbf"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"年轻人的烦恼大多都是来自分泌荷尔蒙的烦恼。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"86149957-e119-4fd6-bf7e-e381c7cf0011"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/09/04"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"06402daf-adb5-4222-8dc1-835326df3e75"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我以为我的感受是源自我的内心，原来这只是写在骨子里的生物代码。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c2a5ee46-5dc8-4833-82ba-205762c1b6d8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/09/04"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5db5909c-4f5a-450b-a666-50cc8a0e2b7f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"多巴胺只是饥渴，内啡肽才是快乐。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"de795a6e-c4ff-4f3b-9934-7599c71c08cd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/09/06"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"a01021a5-913d-4657-a3c7-bc4204c5a44a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如果一件事开始就很痛苦，人本能会逃离，但真正可怕的是那舒适欢愉表象下被“温水煮青蛙”的危险。循序渐进，天天向上，才是最好的生活哲学。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"725f948e-2d02-47d1-a0be-f4b3ee8fa51d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/09/07"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"420c4fe1-e68f-40df-ac52-c1315e43ced5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"其实有时候最令人绝望的并不是压迫本身，而是我们身处压迫却浑然不觉，而真正意识到压迫的那一刻才是自由的开始。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e57bf4aa-d676-4915-b8b2-f50680b9b686"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/09/08"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b2b4e84e-8ed5-4629-bd43-9076ea431540"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"尼采是首位把非理性纳入到哲学范畴的哲学家，其反对机械的理性认为这本身是对人性的一种的扼杀和压抑。人性本身是非理性的，梦想，激情，爱等等，这些是无法用理性的逻辑去分析，推理，测算的。正是因为非理性相对于理性的荒谬和不可预知，人类常常为了集体和社会化的秩序性主动的去抨击和压抑非理性。甚至去成立各项学科运用理性的思维和逻辑去模拟非理性的成因和结果，那么问题来了，能够用理性思维解释的非理性还是非理性吗？不，正是因为它的荒谬它的不可预知它富有的奇迹性和创造力，才使得人类的非理性得以存在。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f33cb9f0-1576-4f5b-a237-e27c388d23cc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/09/13"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e7d2881b-054e-4806-ad94-f86372beea72"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"擅用道德绑架的人，一定都有一个想白嫖的心理。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8f9608ae-fd94-40df-bb78-09c082a4a6f6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/09/16"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"89b38dda-16a1-45bc-9854-ae3d07b792f3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"评价现在其实是在评价过去，而只有未来才能看出当下的决定是否正确。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9f9b0fc6-a375-451b-ad5f-ee6846117d9e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们一切的感受都是对过去的感受。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ad55f84c-7c85-4c16-82e4-e904e6a514dc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/09/23"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0df5006c-3d77-497e-a8cd-98c2234ea14e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"这是一个流行离开的世界‌，而我却一点也不擅长告‌别。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ac3ef2b3-059b-4b3f-b46c-ef75ff4b4578"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/09/24"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"778c8182-e76c-41e6-9f5b-268492be8dd8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"娱乐让思考变得可笑，"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c9caa1b9-0638-44c3-8bb8-48f5d1639ab5"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"机器让人性变得可疑。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"233f607d-9187-408d-b053-b0d307994c75"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/09/29"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"0ab1cec4-7ac9-4c0d-926c-cdb74ad29956"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"见不得别人好的伪君子太多了，还是要闷声发大财。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7818cc7a-12f7-4e3e-b9cb-7307ff8c7e78"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/10/09"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"738af0df-d30d-4077-bcf5-28fad74b75a3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"几年前还在聊用户体验，"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"67dbc72b-e7d4-45cc-bc78-99f75befc81c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"现在没有钱就别谈用户体验。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8771b9f7-b058-4ba0-9058-0e4161551138"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/10/09"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d454244e-0018-4d51-a8e7-8f783cb7fbc7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"难点不在于表达，而在于让别人相信。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c2915546-db0b-416e-b1b5-5be337607188"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/10/11"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bc0f08d1-c579-44f4-b59d-8e5005f1eced"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人类除了热爱八卦，还特别喜欢那些草根逆袭的传奇故事。而那些成功的企业家、革命家、政治家就是把自己变成了这种故事的主角。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d805175a-dc17-491a-800c-0eb338f6172c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/10/11"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"15363f8e-c0d8-4beb-9a00-12078a0c597c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"吃瓜是现代人的刚需。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"91f4e9a2-d8e2-4179-997b-812493efc049"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/10/13"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8cb0774e-ab98-4f98-8243-53b371c1d134"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"如无必要，勿增实体。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"83ce94f6-d598-4711-ad0e-ef173010280a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/10/15"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e811834a-2896-4d56-9bae-a030b2dc5b1a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"万物之中，希望至美；"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2d3cffdb-6dd1-4f6b-bc84-bfc27efbbfdd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"至美之物，永不凋零。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"839e2dbc-9e06-47dd-b34e-6d03a64171a7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/10/17"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bc5194e7-805e-4d2a-8583-512a61afd070"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"生命是自己的，一直生活在别人的眼光里是一件悲哀的事。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4e390a09-e6e8-4e88-85f2-0b18557953ce"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/10/18"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3811ea97-58eb-4236-92db-08d14241ebae"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"文明简单说就是对他人的尊重和对规则的遵守。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"46556ba0-2c8f-4998-8fc4-390aa8fccb9e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/10/19"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e68bf464-134a-44c8-9580-dab2bab60389"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"价值中立是学术研究的规范原则，现在才知道那些曾经在课堂上大肆表达自己价值观的“人民教师”是何等的无耻。讲课是学术活动是科学内的事情，不应该在这个场合表达自己的价值判断。讲课并不是演讲。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"be0b839a-c328-4a4a-865a-f519ccc6da69"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/10/19"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"81537c7f-8795-4172-ad90-8bf692544bec"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"做一件事把每一个能做好的细节做好了其实都会得到想要的结果，可是大多数人都太在乎结果了，每天都在为得失而在焦虑，最后绝大多数都会得不到想要的结果，这就是著名的“瓦伦达效应”。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ce4874ac-1c46-4efe-8105-67c5cb58adb9"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/10/20"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1cd9772b-3757-40b8-8fa8-388768ac6551"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"挣钱的事都挺纯粹，不挣钱的事是真复杂。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f6efa38b-3409-4a34-a905-c151dacbb79c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/10/31"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ecdb5626-30c4-424f-900e-f6af51568dab"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不要让别人来限定自己的思考。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"d20f43b2-c6f1-4459-b8d3-c4d87519849e"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/11/01"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"57fdd5d0-a9f8-44ef-82f0-9efafecfe42d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"每一个人都想成为别人，这就是cosplay当今火的原因吧。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c5d5c4c4-8b57-40ef-8dab-c3bf831e0925"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"其实古代也有cosplay ，比如很多人想成为“圣贤”。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7b5588ac-a4a3-4f53-a50e-ad885c11e851"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/11/01"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"27924e79-aec2-4eeb-920d-dfbb71402f00"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"现在的教学关系越来越变成了权利关系，为什么老师说的学生就要着照着做呢？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"785651b7-0cca-48bb-a167-4db520a495b1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不应该博学之，审问之，明辨之，笃行之嘛……"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8392f8c1-f2e8-4da1-b684-6f62b6d0515b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"老师教的应该是思想，学生有不去听的权利啊，大学应该培养独立思考和自由思想不是嘛……"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"30fca666-7bda-4570-b903-21bd7357a9aa"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/11/07"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"185b3bb6-5ad4-4794-a39e-be8727cd2b5d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"他人即地狱，他人亦天堂。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f90751dd-d236-490c-ac39-4c8e026a6ce3"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/11/08"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"89838785-237e-422f-8cb8-c6d6c36ed610"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"不是人们的意识决定人们的社会存在，相反，是人们的社会存在决定人们的意识。意识的存在方式，以及对意识说来某个东西的存在方式，这就是知识。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7d560749-cf16-4341-8a97-31927e78f161"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"——马克思"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"bd643139-1f3d-416d-98dc-ba0c6e1db5da"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/11/10"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"58ff29cf-9021-485b-91d8-c026c4bd833b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"真正的自由应该是思想上的自由，只有思想自由了才能从混沌中解脱出来。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9bc9aa9c-cfdd-42f9-b63c-4d4032cedb3a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/11/10"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"58ec91c3-653d-4126-a377-32fd38cc2251"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当有了观点的时候，就有了敌人，懂得越多，懂的人也必将越少。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7aa6a9de-7d56-48a7-a344-838bb61e3720"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/11/10"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"de0216dd-1c15-46e2-ae95-69c891cbacf1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"奇葩说可以说是当代中国思想启蒙，思想观点必须包装成段子化的口吻才更好被大众认可。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"ea4917d6-e62f-4faf-907d-a04b0efe7d0a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/11/11"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"49d4a478-0843-45da-941c-3f85948fddbd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"没有异类的世界，就像一道没有加盐的料理。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9ea8c883-8acb-4af8-b8ea-ea5f009245b7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/11/11"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"224896eb-1cc8-4726-a1e8-c7740751d861"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"产品上瘾机制+层次需求理论=社会交换行为。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c3f7c619-52d4-48a8-b5dc-ae0699481903"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/11/11"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1c0b4ccd-8dad-4b37-a425-689d78b6cc34"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"再小的权力，也会让人沉迷。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"e39f1b91-2877-4996-b5a4-0ecdc8f8ee0f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/11/11"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"141514be-26b4-4de5-9fca-4d3357807000"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"见危不援、见死不救的行为常常只是人们在挣扎和权衡之后，所做出的自以为理性的选择。 在一个惩罚善良、制裁正义的制度逻辑之下，如何期待每一位普通的社会成员都拥有高尚的精神？"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"97ed6a28-b9e7-4081-b8b2-c77a774c2e48"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/11/12"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6032e285-d4f6-4ac7-b3da-b1ef7a40f0bc"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"天天看那些男性用户坚韧不拔的在要好看妹子的微信，有一种感受，这是表面的男权社会。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1e9ea931-f93f-450c-93c6-404c4b31653f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/11/12"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b82b68be-592a-49ad-bfd1-f17de3491554"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"人的认知过程基本是被权力所主导的，是被权力扭曲的人为现实，是意识形态，而不是现实本身。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b2d56db7-fe49-45c7-8067-e6d230d62f15"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/11/12"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9e994cdc-7cb5-4a16-8b57-355a31dacc0f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"要破除的就是对“思想”和知识的迷信，尤其是对既定历史知识和科学价值观的迷信。破除一种对“从野蛮走向文明”的历史迷信，其实人类一直在原地踏步，而且情况可能愈发糟糕。现代社会就像一台庞大而臃肿的规训权力机器，似乎永远不会年久失修。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"4e7b2c3c-9f55-4e1d-b1ad-e21b5ea7bc3d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/11/12"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"3c589685-dc56-4e09-aecd-ba7060a7a7ca"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"当我们把知识不假思索的视为真理时，我们是迷信的。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"fe256489-2c7f-449c-b046-50bfed0242dd"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/11/12"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2ff6e457-53c9-4195-8115-313f887fd45d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"主體需要通過指認他者來完成對自己的命名，「瘋子」是這個世界所謂的「正常人」的一面鏡子。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"5494e790-54c3-43da-a664-f491d2ded0d4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/11/13"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"1da8aef5-c0fb-4a2a-b7a1-d651212cf918"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"自由和平等是一对天然的矛盾。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"70365b16-1dac-4665-8aa9-1805844fd0f8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/11/13"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c44e85b3-47d9-491b-b77a-d1029dfbfab8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"在货币交易范围内，人人在价值上平等，不是因为每个人都有价值，而是因为除了金钱没有人有价值。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8ba8f860-b5ce-48e4-a486-754397a28a6b"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"——西美尔"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"58f5abb2-21a6-4968-8f6d-aaee29ce2e17"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/11/20"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6100dd93-f726-4297-a0b6-ecd49afd9f00"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"美是一个主观感受，贫穷和富有也是一个主观感受。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"357de5c3-178b-4a62-b63e-7b1485f7671f"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/11/21"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9e4874e0-60a6-4798-b28e-5d9bc218dae1"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我高中當時沒有選擇文科究其本質是因為當時太貧窮了，貧窮迫使我不得不選擇像工科這種較實用的學科，畢竟在溫飽階段是很難有精力去想這些有的沒的，文史類學科向來都是貴族人的玩意兒。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c09ca758-d723-46d9-83b5-b1448c578208"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"還有就是我沒有一個名字中間有個 ·馮·字的親戚。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"da897865-0f2e-4f4f-908f-e841e121554c"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/11/23"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"98b29dcc-d0c8-4160-b8b2-10dc70c8a219"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"无数历史事件证明，良心这种东西是不靠谱的。所以在现代社会法律合同是达成和制约“社会契约”的‌必要方式，同时侧面也说明了依法治国的重要性。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"8171612f-850d-4aa1-9a26-72e11bc6a721"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/11/25"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"c91cc89b-e3d4-4d62-a43d-2550ee2bf154"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我们对宗教的需要是来自于对现世的不满。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"40c5227e-9dcf-432d-8721-02924d3666a8"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/11/25"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"286dd48f-6104-4c52-97b3-c05ba2ba1a26"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"我不怕真实的邪恶，我怕虚伪的善良。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2bff7515-b398-4ef8-9f17-216bca2a1037"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/11/26"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"64beaf00-ca73-4720-9ff2-0b5acd8bbea7"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"自由跟害怕是一个相对性的概念。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"7ac979d6-3177-406d-aa9c-efba7f630cb4"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/11/28"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"6fd8cf3c-9844-4680-97bd-c730b3e39a1a"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"一切諸經，皆不過是敲門磚，是要敲開門，喚出其中的人來，此人即是你自己。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9692cd8a-8211-419d-8c56-af222d7177f6"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/11/30"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"b51020dd-38c5-4bfa-9611-0492cb407e1d"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"凡所有相，皆是虛妄。一切有為法，如夢幻泡影。不要執著於有為法，不要刻意追求修行的方法，每個人心中皆有佛性，佛就在你心中。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"2430233b-688b-4cd4-a2db-21b9180995ae"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"2019/11/30"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"9da57710-f9f4-401b-b766-f6ab36e84254"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"互聯網時代的好處之一就是極大的提高了人與人之間的吵架效率，也促成了不同價值觀之間的碰撞。"}]},{"type":"paragraph","attrs":{"id":"f749a6f4-a5c0-42c1-be4c-922a8a94f0e9"},"co
